scn HauntedFlickeringLightExtraScript
short doOnce
float fTimer int FlickerChance short FlickerState
Begin OnLoad if (doOnce == 0) set fTimer to 3
set doOnce to 1 endif end
Begin GameMode
; Added a quest variable so that the lights don't flicker when there's no power if (HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.FlickeringLights == 1)
if (fTimer > 0) set fTimer to (fTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
if (fTimer <= 3 && flickerState == 0) set flickerChance to GetRandomPercent
if (flickerChance <= 60) Disable endif
set flickerState to 1
elseif (fTimer <= 2.5 && flickerState == 1)
if (GetDisabled == 1) Enable
set flickerState to 2 endif
set flickerChance to GetRandomPercent
if (flickerChance <= 60) Disable endif
set flickerState to 2
elseif (fTimer <= 2 && flickerState == 2)
if (GetDisabled == 1) Enable
set flickerState to 3 endif
set flickerChance to GetRandomPercent
if (flickerChance <= 60) Disable endif
set flickerState to 3
elseif (fTimer <= 1.5 && flickerState == 3)
if (GetDisabled == 1) Enable
set flickerState to 4 endif
set flickerChance to GetRandomPercent
if (flickerChance <= 60) Disable endif
set flickerState to 4
elseif (fTimer <= 1 && flickerState == 4)
if (GetDisabled == 1) Enable endif
set fTimer to 3 set flickerState to 0
endif
; Disable the lights in case they're on when the power is turned off elseif (HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.FlickeringLights == 0 && GetDisabled == 0) Disable endif
end

scn HauntedTestPipBoyLightSwitchScript
; Flickering pip-boy light ; Changed the button to use the Quest instead
short startUp int LightRadius
short flickerStart short flickerStage float flickerTimer
short CheckingKeyPress
Begin OnActivate
Activate if (HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.startUp == 0) StartQuest HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest set HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.startUp to 1 else set HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.flickerTimer to 0 set HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.flickerStage to 0 set HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.flickerStart to 0
set HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.startUp to 0 StopQuest HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest endif
end
;Begin GameMode ; ; if (startUp == 1) ; if (TogglePipBoyLight == 1 && flickerStart == 0) ; set flickerTimer to 3 ; ;set LightRadius to (GetLightTraitNumeric PipboyLight640 0) ; set flickerStart to 1 ; ; ;elseif (TogglePipBoyLight == 0 && flickerStart == 1 ) ; ; print "Light turned off, stop" ; ; set flickerTimer to 0 ; ; set flickerStage to 0 ; ; set flickerStart to 0 ; endif ; ; if (IsControlPressed 14 == 1 && CheckingKeyPress == 0 && flickerStart == 1) ; print "Pip-Boy button pressed, checking" ; set CheckingKeyPress to 1 ; ; elseif (IsControlPressed 14 == 0 && CheckingKeyPress == 1 && flickerStart == 1) ; if (TogglePipBoyLight == 0) ; print "Light turned off, stop" ; set flickerTimer to 0 ; set flickerStage to 0 ; set flickerStart to 0 ; set CheckingKeyPress to 0 ; else ; print "Press didn't turn light off, continuing" ; set CheckingKeyPress to 0 ; endif ; endif ; ; endif ; ; if (flickerStart == 1 && flickerTimer > 0) ; set flickerTimer to flickerTimer - GetSecondsPassed ; endif ; ; if (flickerStart == 1) ; ; if (flickerStage == 0 && flickerTimer <= 2.5) ; Player.Dispel PipBoyLight ; PlaySound UIPipBoyLightOff ; ;print "Light Off" ; set flickerStage to 1 ; ; elseif (flickerStage == 1 && flickerTimer <= 2.25) ; Player.AddSpellNS PipBoyLight ; PlaySound UIPipBoyLightOff ; ;print "Light On" ; set flickerStage to 2 ; ; elseif (flickerStage == 2 && flickerTimer <= 2) ; Player.Dispel PipBoyLight ; PlaySound UIPipBoyLightOff ; ;print "Light Off" ; set flickerStage to 3 ; ; elseif (flickerStage == 3 && flickerTimer <= 1.75) ; Player.AddSpellNS PipBoyLight ; PlaySound UIPipBoyLightOff ; ;print "Light On" ; set flickerStage to 0 ; set flickerTimer to 3 ; endif ; ; endif ; ;end

scn HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuestScript
; Use this variable to start the flickering when calling the quest short startUp
; Remember to set all these to 3 when stopping the flickering short flickerStart short flickerStage float flickerTimer
short CheckingKeyPress
Begin GameMode
if (startUp == 1) if (TogglePipBoyLight == 1 && flickerStart == 0) set flickerTimer to 3 set flickerStart to 1 endif
if (IsControlPressed 14 == 1 && CheckingKeyPress == 0 && flickerStart == 1) ;print "Pip-Boy button pressed, checking" set CheckingKeyPress to 1
elseif (IsControlPressed 14 == 0 && CheckingKeyPress == 1 && flickerStart == 1) if (TogglePipBoyLight == 0) ;print "Light turned off, stop" set flickerTimer to 0 set flickerStage to 0 set flickerStart to 0 set CheckingKeyPress to 0 else ;print "Press didn't turn light off, continuing" set CheckingKeyPress to 0 endif endif
endif
if (flickerStart == 1 && flickerTimer > 0) set flickerTimer to flickerTimer - GetSecondsPassed endif
if (flickerStart == 1)
if (flickerStage == 0 && flickerTimer <= 2.75) Player.Dispel PipBoyLight PlaySound UIPipBoyLightOff ;print "Light Off" set flickerStage to 1
elseif (flickerStage == 1 && flickerTimer <= 2.5) Player.AddSpellNS PipBoyLight PlaySound UIPipBoyLightOff ;print "Light On" set flickerStage to 2
elseif (flickerStage == 2 && flickerTimer <= 2.25) Player.Dispel PipBoyLight PlaySound UIPipBoyLightOff ;print "Light Off" set flickerStage to 3
elseif (flickerStage == 3 && flickerTimer <= 2) Player.AddSpellNS PipBoyLight PlaySound UIPipBoyLightOff ;print "Light On" set flickerStage to 0 set flickerTimer to 3 endif
endif
end

scn HauntedHotel01RoomRubbleCloserTriggerScript
short doorWait
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
if (doorWait == 0 && Player.GetLOS HauntedHotel01RoomRubbleGhostRef == 1 && HauntedHotel01RoomRubbleGhostRef.GetDisabled == 0) HauntedHotel01RoomRubbleDoorRef.SetOpenState 0
set doorWait to 1 endif
end
Begin OnTriggerLeave Player
; Failsafe for if the player happens to be looking away as they exit the trigger, for whatever reason ; Otherwise it'd mean they'd be able to step into the room, which is a no no) if (doorWait == 0) HauntedHotel01RoomRubbleDoorRef.SetOpenState 0
set doorWait to 1 endif
end
Begin Gamemode
if (doorWait == 1 && HauntedHotel01RoomRubbleDoorRef.GetOpenState == 3) HauntedHotel01RoomRubbleGhostRef.Disable HauntedHotel01GhostRoomRubbleEnabler.Enable
set doorWait to 2
disable markfordelete endif
end

scn HauntedBasementBreakerBoxScript
short LightsTurningOn float LightsTimer
; Remember that I need to set up the generator part too, later ; I did it :)
Begin OnActivate
PlaySound UIPipBoyTab
if (HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.GeneratorsOn == 1)
SwapTextureEx HauntedBasementBreakerBoxRef "BoxInteriorTri" "HauntedCasino\clutter\ebox_int_on" 0 SwapTextureEx HauntedBasementBreakerBoxRef "BoxInteriorTri" "HauntedCasino\clutter\ebox_int_on_g" 2
PlaySound HauntedOBJCasinoSwitch PlaySound HauntedMusEventBasementPowered 1 HauntedBasementPowerDoorRef.SetDefaultOpen 0 set LightsTurningOn to 1 HauntedBasementPowerGhostScareRef.Enable ; Disable the ghost follower in the Service Route HauntedServiceRouteGhostFollowerRef.Disable set LightsTimer to 4
SetDestroyed 1
else
ShowMessage HauntedBreakerBoxGeneratorMessage
endif
end
Begin GameMode
if (LightsTurningOn == 1)
if (LightsTimer > 0) set LightsTimer to LightsTimer - GetSecondsPassed endif
; Turn the pip-boy light off when the power is turning on if (LightsTimer > 0 && TogglePipBoyLight == 1) TogglePipBoyLight endif
if (LightsTimer <= 1)
PlaySound OBJSwitchLights2D
; Basement HauntedBasementLightsEnablerRef.Enable SetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoBasement HauntedLightsOnBasementTemplate
; Casino HauntedCasLobbyLightsEnablerRef.Enable ;HauntedCasLobbyMusicRef.Enable HauntedCasLobbyMusicSpeakerRef.Enable ; Burning Ghost removed for now ;HauntedLobbyBurningGhostRef.Enable SetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoLobby HauntedLightsOnTemplate HauntedCasLobbyDetectorSparksRef.Enable
; Enable the radio trigger in the lobby HauntedRadioTalkerLobbyPowerOnRef.Enable HauntedRadioTalkerLobbyPowerOnTriggerRef.Enable
; Restaurant HauntedCasRestaurantLightsEnablerRef.Enable ;HauntedCasRestaurantMusicRef.Enable HauntedCasRestaurantMusicSpeakerRef.Enable SetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoRestaurant HauntedLightsOnTemplate
; Lounge HauntedCasLoungeLightsEnablerRef.Enable ;HauntedCasLoungeMusicRef.Enable SetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoLounge HauntedLightsOnTemplate
; Service Route HauntedCasServiceLightsEnablerRef.Enable SetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoServiceRoute HauntedLightsOnBasementTemplate HauntedServiceSecurityControlPanelRef.Enable HauntedServiceSecurityControlPanelRef.PlayGroup Right 1 HauntedServiceRouteBarricade01Ref.Enable ; Created a barricade to stop the player from going back through the kitchen HauntedServiceRouteRatsEnabler01Ref.Disable ; Disable the rats
; Activate the flickering lights set HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.FlickeringLights to 1 set HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.PowerTurnedOn to 1 set LightsTurningOn to 0
; Disable the ghost in the basement HauntedBasementPowerGhostScareRef.Disable
; Prepare the Walker's Door HauntedBasementHallDoorPowerRef.SetOpenState 1 HauntedBasementHallMobsterWalkerRef.Enable HauntedBasementHallMobsterWalkerRef.SetRestrained 1
SetObjectiveCompleted HauntedMQ01 30 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 35 1
endif
endif
end

scn HauntedLobbyBurningGhostTriggerScript
short doOnce int fireStart float fireTimer
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce == 0 && HauntedLobbyBurningGhostRef.GetDisabled == 0) PlaySound HauntedFXBurningLadyScream PlaySound HauntedMusEventBurningLady HauntedLobbyBurningGhostRef.PMS Flames01 imod DLC03FlamerImpactISFX set fireStart to 1 set fireTimer to 3 endif
end

if (fireStart == 1)
if (fireTimer < 1) HauntedLobbyBurningGhostRef.PlaceAtMe GasTrapFireBurst 1 imod VArchimedesFlashISFX HauntedLobbyBurningGhostRef.Disable
set fireTimer to 0 set fireStart to 0 endif
endif
end

scn HauntedGhostInvisibleScript
short DoOnce short BackingUp
Begin OnLoad ; Try changing the OnLoad to fix the bug where he'll become visible ; (I've had to tweak & fix this fucker so many times, jesus christ) ; Take like #674 at this point, please work you stupid thing if (GetInteractionDisabled == 0 || GetActorAlpha > 0 || GetIsGhost == 0) SetGhost 1 ; Make it invincible SetActorAlpha 0 ; Make it invisible ;ToggleObjectCollision 0 ;ForceActorDetectionValue -100 ; Remove the compass tick SetAV Chameleon 1 ; Remove compass tick also. Maybe this will finally fix all my problems. SetVatsTargetable 0 ; Make it un-targetable in VATS SetInteractionDisabled 1 ; Remove the ability to interact with the NPC
;set doOnce to 1 endif end
; Makes the ghost run away if the player gets close to them (so that the player doesn't bump into them) Begin Gamemode
if (GetDistance Player <= 150 && BackingUp == 0)
MoveAwayFrom Player 250 1 set BackingUp to 1
elseif (GetDistance Player >= 200 && BackingUp == 1)
set BackingUp to 0
endif
if (GetInteractionDisabled == 0 || GetActorAlpha > 0 || GetIsGhost == 0) SetGhost 1 ; Make it invincible SetActorAlpha 0 ; Make it invisible ;ForceActorDetectionValue -100 ; Remove the compass tick SetAV Chameleon 1 ; Remove compass tick also. Maybe this will finally fix all my problems. SetVatsTargetable 0 ; Make it un-targetable in VATS SetInteractionDisabled 1 ; Remove the ability to interact with the NPC
;set doOnce to 1 endif
end

if (GetActorAlpha != 0.4) SetGhost 1 SetActorAlpha 0.4 set doOnce to 1 ForceActorDetectionValue -100 SetRestrained 1 Look Player SetInteractionDisabled 1 SetVatsTargetable 0 endif
; Makes the shadow ghost vanish half a second after being seen if (vanishState == 0 && GetDisabled == 0) if (Player.GetLOS mySelf == 1) set vanishTimer to 2 set vanishState to 1 endif endif
if (vanishTimer > 0) set vanishTimer to vanishTimer - GetSecondsPassed endif
if (vanishTimer < 1.5 && vanishState == 1) set vanishTimer to 0 set vanishState to 2 Disable ;MarkForDelete endif
end

Begin OnActivate Player

SetDestroyed 1 endif
end

set bedState to 1 elseif (bedTimer < 4 && bedState == 1) HauntedHotel02HallucinationSFXAlarmRef.Enable HauntedHotel02HallucinationSFXFireRef.Enable ;HauntedHotel02HallucinationSFXAlarmRef.Enable ;HauntedHotel02HallucinationSFXCrowdRef.Enable
set bedState to 2 elseif (bedTimer < 3 && bedState == 2) EnablePlayerControls 1 0 0 1 1 1 0 Autosave ;SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQHallucination 50 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 72 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 73 1
; Slows the player down Print "Player base speed mult is:" + $(Player.GetAV SpeedMult) set HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.RegularSpeed to (Player.GetAV SpeedMult) Player.SetSpeedMult 50 Print "Player slowed speed mult is:" + $(Player.GetAV SpeedMult)
set bedState to 3 set bedTimer to 0 set bedStart to 0 endif endif
end

ref equipClothes ref equipWeapon

HauntedHotel02HallucinationBurnEffectsEnabler.Disable HauntedHotel02HallucinationSFXCrowdRef.Disable HauntedHotel02HallucinationSFXFireRef.Disable HauntedHotel02HallucinationSFXAlarmRef.Disable

scn HauntedCasLobbyElevatorButtonScript
short doOnce
short elevStart short elevState float elevTimer
Begin OnActivate Player
PlaySound OBJSwitchElevator
if (HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.PowerTurnedOn == 1) && (doOnce == 0) && (Player.GetItemCount HauntedKeyElevatorKeycard >= 1)
;HauntedCasLobbyElevatorSoundRef.Enable set elevStart to 1 set elevTimer to 30
; Lock the exit doors so that the player can't escape HauntedCasinoLoungeEntDoorRef.Lock 255 HauntedCasinoRestaurantEntDoorRef.Lock 255 HauntedCasinoServEntDoor01Ref.Lock 255 HauntedCasinoServEntDoor02Ref.Lock 255 HauntedCasLobbyEntDoorRef.SetDestroyed 1
SetObjectiveCompleted HauntedMQ01 60 1
set doOnce to 1
elseif (HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.PowerTurnedOn == 1 && elevStart == 0 && Player.GetItemCount HauntedKeyElevatorKeycard == 0) ShowMessage HauntedElevatorMessageGetKeycard elseif (HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.PowerTurnedOn == 1) && (elevStart == 1) ShowMessage HauntedElevatorMessageButtonBusy else ShowMessage HauntedElevatorMessageNoPower endif
end
Begin GameMode
if (elevTimer > 0 && elevStart == 1) set elevTimer to elevTimer - GetSecondsPassed endif
if (elevStart == 1) ; 20 Second wait for the elevator
; Stop the casino music if (elevTimer < 25 && elevState == 0) HauntedCasLobbyMusicSpeakerRef.Disable PlaySound HauntedFXSpeakersTurningOff
set elevState to 1
; Flicker the lights elseif (elevTimer < 20 && elevState == 1) PlaySound HauntedMusEventLobbyElevator 1 HauntedCasLobbyLightsEnablerRef.Disable PlaySound OBJSwitchLights2D
set elevState to 2
elseif (elevTimer < 19.5 && elevState == 2) HauntedCasLobbyLightsEnablerRef.Enable
set elevState to 3
; Turn off all the lights elseif (elevTimer < 19 && elevState == 3) HauntedCasLobbyLightsEnablerRef.Disable PlaySound OBJSwitchLights2D set HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.PowerTurnedOn to 0 set HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.FlickeringLights to 0
set elevState to 4
; Put everything back to normal elseif (elevTimer < 12 && elevState == 4) HauntedCasLobbyLightsEnablerRef.Enable set HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.PowerTurnedOn to 1 set HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.FlickeringLights to 1 PlaySound OBJSwitchLights2D HauntedCasLobbyMusicSpeakerRef.Enable
; Unlock the doors HauntedCasinoLoungeEntDoorRef.Unlock HauntedCasinoRestaurantEntDoorRef.Unlock HauntedCasinoServEntDoor01Ref.Unlock HauntedCasinoServEntDoor02Ref.Unlock HauntedCasLobbyEntDoorRef.SetDestroyed 0
set elevState to 5
; Stop the movement sound elseif (elevTimer < 10 && elevState == 5) ;HauntedCasLobbyElevatorSoundRef.Disable HauntedCasLobbyElevatorInnerDoorRef.PlaySound3D HauntedFXElevatorStopSound SetDestroyed 1
set elevState to 6
; Play the elevator ding elseif (elevTimer < 9 && elevState == 6) PlaySound HauntedFXElevatorBellRing HauntedCasLobbyElevatorLightRef.Enable
set elevState to 7
; Start opening the exterior door elseif (elevTimer < 8.5 && elevState == 7) HauntedCasLobbyElevatorDoorRef.SetOpenState 1
set elevState to 8
; Start opening the interior door, delayed elseif (elevTimer < 8 && elevState == 8) HauntedCasLobbyElevatorInnerDoorRef.SetOpenState 1 HauntedCasLobbyElevatorMusicRef.Enable
SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 61 1
set elevState to 9 set elevStart to 0 set elevTimer to 0
endif endif
end

if (doOnce == 0) ;SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQHallucination 50 0 ;SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQHallucination 60 0
; MOVED THIS TO THE BED SCRIPT ; Slows the player down ;Print "Player base speed mult is:" + $(Player.GetAV SpeedMult) ;set HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.RegularSpeed to (Player.GetAV SpeedMult) ;Player.ModAV SpeedMult ((HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.RegularSpeed / 2) * -1) ;Player.SetSpeedMult 40 ;Print "Player slowed speed mult is:" + $(Player.GetAV SpeedMult)
set screamTimer to 3 set screamStage to 1
HauntedHotel02HallucinationDoorRef.SetOpenState 1 PlaySound HauntedFXCrowdScreamingStart ;imod NVCaveEnteringStartISFX ;imod NVCaveEnteringISFX ;HauntedHotel02HallucinationSFXCrowdRef.Enable
set doOnce to 1 endif
end

scn HauntedIndigoLoungeEventCodeboxScript
; Holds the script for the event in the Indigo Lounge
; HauntedIndigoLoungeProjectorStage01Ref ; 6865.3467
float eventTimer
int eventStage
Begin GameMode
if (HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.IndigoLoungeEventStart == 1 && eventStage == 0) set eventStage to 1 HauntedIndigoLoungeLightsEnablerRef.Disable HauntedIndigoLoungeProjectorSoundRef.Disable HauntedIndigoLoungeProjectorLightsRef.Disable
; Changed this part to individual refs as well, added a GetDisabled check in case they already faded away ;HauntedIndigoLoungeFriendlyGhostsRef.Disable if (HauntedIndigoLoungeBartenderRef.GetDisabled == 0) HauntedIndigoLoungeBartenderRef.Disable endif if (HauntedIndigoLoungeGuest01Ref.GetDisabled == 0) HauntedIndigoLoungeGuest01Ref.Disable endif if (HauntedIndigoLoungeGuest02Ref.GetDisabled == 0) HauntedIndigoLoungeGuest02Ref.Disable endif
HauntedIndigoLoungeFireBlockerRef.Enable ;HauntedIndigoLoungeBartenderRef.StopIdle ; Stop the bartender's animations to stop a crash HauntedIndigoLoungeStageTerminalRef.Disable ; Disable the terminal so that the player can't read it in the middle of the hunt
; Turn off the Lounge lights as well HauntedCasLoungeLightsEnablerRef.Disable SetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoLounge HauntedLightsOffTemplate ; Temporarily turn off power so that the lighting template doesn't update + the lights don't flicker set HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.PowerTurnedOn to 0 HauntedIndigoLoungeEscapeTriggerRef.Enable
PlaySound OBJSwitchLights2D
DisablePlayerControls 1 1 0 1 0 1 1
set eventTimer to 8 endif
if (HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.IndigoLoungeEventStart == 1 && eventTimer > 0) set eventTimer to eventTimer - (GetSecondsPassed) endif
if (eventStage == 1 && eventTimer < 7) ; Start Stage 1 of the Creepy Projector - just fire PlaySound HauntedMusEventProjectorRed 1 HauntedIndigoLoungeProjectorRedRef.Enable PlaySound OBJProjectorGOATSlideChange HauntedIndigoLoungeProjectorSoundRef.Enable ;HauntedIndigoLoungeProjectorStage01Ref.Enable 0 HauntedIndigoLoungeProjectorStage01Ref.SetPos Z 6865.3467 ;HauntedIndigoLoungeProjectorStage01Ref.Update3D ; Added Update3D to fix the lighting bug (didnt work)
Print "Stage 1: Fire Slide"
set eventStage to 2 elseif (eventStage == 2 && eventTimer < 6.5) PlaySound FXFireGasLow HauntedIndigoLoungeHuntFireSoundsRef.Enable
Print "Stage 2: Fire Sound" set eventStage to 3
elseif (eventStage == 3 && eventTimer < 4.5) ; Change the slide to the creepy face projector slide HauntedIndigoLoungeProjectorStage01Ref.Disable ;HauntedIndigoLoungeProjectorStage02Ref.Enable 0 HauntedIndigoLoungeProjectorStage02Ref.SetPos Z 6865.3467 ;HauntedIndigoLoungeProjectorStage02Ref.Update3D ; Added Update3D to fix the lighting bug (didnt work) PlaySound OBJProjectorGOATSlideChange
Print "Stage 3: Face Slide" set eventStage to 4 elseif (eventStage == 4 && eventTimer < 4.4) HauntedIndigoLoungeProjectorStage02Ref.Update3D ; Added Update3D to fix the lighting bug, hopefully works this time
set eventStage to 5 elseif (eventStage == 5 && eventTimer < 3.5) ; Make the ghost appear HauntedIndigoLoungeGhostHuntingRef.Enable HauntedIndigoLoungeGhostHuntingRef.SetRestrained 1 HauntedIndigoLoungeGhostExplosionRef.PlaceAtMe GasTrapFireBurst 1 HauntedIndigoLoungeHuntMusRef.Enable
;set HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.cameraDisabled to 1
HauntedEndingHeadGhostRef.SayTo Player HauntedGhostRun 1 PlaySound HauntedGhostRunLine
EnablePlayerControls SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 56 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 57 1
Print "Stage 4: Appearance" set eventStage to 6 elseif (eventStage == 6 && eventTimer < 3.2) ; Start the Hunt set HauntedIndigoLoungeGhostHuntingRef.HuntActive to 1 HauntedIndigoLoungeGhostHuntingRef.SetRestrained 0 ;HauntedIndigoLoungeGhostHuntingRef.CIOS HauntedGhostFireLightEffect HauntedIndigoLoungeBarBlockerRef.Disable
Print "Stage 5: Hunt" set eventTimer to 0 set eventStage to 7 endif
; Stop the hunt if the player dies, just to be safe if (Player.GetDead == 1 && HauntedIndigoLoungeGhostHuntingRef.HuntActive == 1) set HauntedIndigoLoungeGhostHuntingRef.HuntActive to 0 endif
end

set shatterState to 2 elseif (shatterTimer < 4.5 && shatterState == 2) HauntedHotel02NorthHallLightMark03Ref.PlaySound3D HauntedFXLightBulbBreak01 HauntedHotel02NorthHallLight03Ref.Disable HauntedHotel02NorthHallLightMark03Ref.PlaceAtMe GaussImpactExplosion 1
set shatterState to 3 elseif (shatterTimer < 4 && shatterState == 3) HauntedHotel02NorthHallLightMark04Ref.PlaySound3D HauntedFXLightBulbBreak01 HauntedHotel02NorthHallLight04Ref.Disable HauntedHotel02NorthHallLightMark04Ref.PlaceAtMe GaussImpactExplosion 1 HauntedHotel02NorthHallLightSparks04Ref.Enable
set shatterState to 4 elseif (shatterTimer < 3.5 && shatterState == 4) HauntedHotel02NorthHallLightMark05Ref.PlaySound3D HauntedFXLightBulbBreak01 HauntedHotel02NorthHallLight05Ref.Disable HauntedHotel02NorthHallLightMark05Ref.PlaceAtMe GaussImpactExplosion 1
set shatterState to 5 elseif (shatterTimer < 3 && shatterState == 5)
set shatterStart to 0 set shatterTimer to 0 set shatterState to 6 Disable ;MarkForDelete endif endif

scn HauntedHotel03HallHuntTriggerScript
; Starts a light shatter down the hallway, then starts the hunt
; NVDLC01AMBVaultEscapeStart
float huntTimer short huntState short huntStart short doOnce
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
if (huntStart == 0) ;DisablePlayerControls
set huntTimer to 10 set huntStart to 1 endif
end
Begin OnTriggerLeave Player if (doOnce == 0) DisablePlayerControls 1 1 0 1 0 1 1 SetObjectiveCompleted HauntedMQ01 70 1
set doOnce to 1 endif
end
Begin Gamemode
if (huntStart == 1 && huntTimer > 0) set huntTimer to huntTimer - GetSecondsPassed endif
if (huntStart == 1)
if (huntTimer < 9.8 && huntState == 0) HauntedHotel03HallLight01Ref.Disable HauntedHotel03HallLightExp01Ref.PlaceAtMe GaussImpactExplosion 1 HauntedHotel03HallLightExp01Ref.PlaySound3D HauntedFXLightBulbBreak01
set huntState to 1 elseif (huntTimer < 9.4 && huntState == 1) HauntedHotel03HallLight02Ref.Disable HauntedHotel03HallLightExp02Ref.PlaceAtMe GaussImpactExplosion 1 HauntedHotel03HallLightExp02Ref.PlaySound3D HauntedFXLightBulbBreak01
set huntState to 2 elseif (huntTimer < 9 && huntState == 2) HauntedHotel03HallLight03Ref.Disable HauntedHotel03HallLightExp03Ref.PlaceAtMe GaussImpactExplosion 1 HauntedHotel03HallLightExp03Ref.PlaySound3D HauntedFXLightBulbBreak01
HauntedHotel03HallDoor01Ref.SetOpenState 1 HauntedHotel03HallDoor02Ref.SetOpenState 1
set huntState to 3 elseif (huntTimer < 8.6 && huntState == 3) HauntedHotel03HallLight04Ref.Disable HauntedHotel03HallLightExp04Ref.PlaceAtMe GaussImpactExplosion 1 HauntedHotel03HallLightExp04Ref.PlaySound3D HauntedFXLightBulbBreak01
set huntState to 4 elseif (huntTimer < 8.2 && huntState == 4) HauntedHotel03HallLight05Ref.Disable HauntedHotel03HallLightExp05Ref.PlaceAtMe GaussImpactExplosion 1 HauntedHotel03HallLightExp05Ref.PlaySound3D HauntedFXLightBulbBreak01
HauntedHotel03HallDoor03Ref.SetOpenState 1 HauntedHotel03HallDoor04Ref.SetOpenState 1
set huntState to 5 elseif (huntTimer < 7.8 && huntState == 5) HauntedHotel03HallLightEndRef.Disable HauntedHotel03GhostHuntingRef.Enable HauntedHotel03HallExplosionMarkerRef.PlaceAtMe GasTrapFireBurst 1 PlaySound FXFireGasHigh
;HauntedHotel03HallCameraTriggerRef.Enable
set huntState to 6 elseif (huntTimer < 7.2 && huntState == 6)
HauntedHotel03GhostHuntingRef.SayTo Player HauntedMobsterLineEnough 1 PlaySound HauntedMobsterEnough ; Double up on the line to make it more audible ;PlaySound NVDLC01AMBVaultEscapeStart
set huntState to 7 elseif (huntTimer < 7 && huntState == 7) PlaySound NVDLC01AMBVaultEscapeStart SetCameraShake 0.8 10
set huntState to 8 elseif (huntTimer < 4 && huntState == 8) HauntedHotel03HallCeilingEffectsRef.PlayGroup Forward 1 HauntedHotel03HallCeilingEffects02Ref.PlayGroup Forward 1 PlaySound HauntedFXRubbleCrash01 HauntedHotel03HallCeilingBrokenRef.Enable HauntedHotel03HallCeilingSlabRef.Enable ;HauntedHotel03HallCeilingExpMarker.PlaceAtMe HauntedFXDustExplosion01 1 HauntedHotel03HallCeilingPushMarker.PlaceAtMe FakeForce400r100 1 Set HauntedHotel03HallCeilingFallCodeboxRef.fallStart to 1
set huntState to 9 elseif (huntTimer < 2.5 && huntState == 9) set HauntedHotel03GhostHuntingRef.HuntActive to 1 HauntedHotel03GhostHuntingRef.AddScriptPackage HauntedGhostHuntingPackage HauntedHotel03GhostHuntingRef.evp HauntedHotel03HallHuntMusRef.Enable EnablePlayerControls ;HauntedHotel03HallCameraTriggerRef.Disable ;set HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.cameraDisabled to 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 75 1
set huntState to 10 set huntTimer to 0 set huntStart to 0 endif
endif
end

PlaySound HauntedFXElevatorBellRing ;HauntedHotel03ElevatorGhostRepairRef.Disable ;1 ; Make him fade away
;set HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.cameraDisabled to 0

end

set elevState to 5 elseif (elevTimer < 1.7 && elevState == 5) HauntedHotel03ElevatorGhostRepairRef.SetActorAlpha 0.2

set elevState to 7 elseif (elevTimer < 1.5 && elevState == 7) HauntedHotel03ElevatorGhostRepairRef.Disable
set elevState to 8 set elevTimer to 0 set elevStart to 0
Disable MarkForDelete endif
endif
end

scn HauntedHotel03HallEndMobsterMoveTriggerScript

scn HauntedTestHauntLightScript
; Test for lights that flicker when a ghost is nearby during a hunt
short HunterNearby
float fTimer int FlickerChance short FlickerState
Begin GameMode
if (GetDistance HauntedTestChasingGhostRef <= 300 && HunterNearby == 0)
set HunterNearby to 1 set fTimer to 3
elseif (GetDistance HauntedTestChasingGhostRef > 300 && HunterNearby == 1)
set HunterNearby to 0 set fTimer to 0
endif
if (HauntedTestChasingGhostRef.GetDisabled == 0)
if (fTimer > 0) set fTimer to (fTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
if (HunterNearby == 1) if (fTimer <= 3 && flickerState == 0) set flickerChance to GetRandomPercent
if (flickerChance <= 80) Disable endif
set flickerState to 1
elseif (fTimer <= 2.75 && flickerState == 1)
if (GetDisabled == 1) Enable
set flickerState to 2 endif
set flickerChance to GetRandomPercent
if (flickerChance <= 80) Disable endif
set flickerState to 2
elseif (fTimer <= 2.5 && flickerState == 2)
if (GetDisabled == 1) Enable
set flickerState to 3 endif
set flickerChance to GetRandomPercent
if (flickerChance <= 80) Disable endif
set flickerState to 3
elseif (fTimer <= 2.25 && flickerState == 3)
if (GetDisabled == 1) Enable
set flickerState to 4 endif
set flickerChance to GetRandomPercent
if (flickerChance <= 80) Disable endif
set flickerState to 4
elseif (fTimer <= 2 && flickerState == 4)
if (GetDisabled == 1) Enable endif
set fTimer to 3 set flickerState to 0
endif endif
endif
end

scn HauntedGhostHuntingProximityDamageScript
; Damage the player depending on their proximity to the ghost during a hunt
short PlayerClose ; 0 = not close, 1 = close short healthRange ; 0 = no range, 1 = medium range, 2 = close range short PipBoyFlicker short fireSpell short huntActive
short doOnce
float damageBase float healthDamage
Begin OnLoad
if (GetInteractionDisabled == 0) SetGhost 1 set doOnce to 1 ForceActorDetectionValue -100 SetAV Chameleon 1 SetInteractionDisabled 1 SetVatsTargetable 0 endif
end
Begin GameMode
if (fireSpell == 0) PMS Flames01 set fireSpell to 1 endif
; Added it here as well like the invis ghost if (GetInteractionDisabled == 0) SetGhost 1 ;set doOnce to 1 ForceActorDetectionValue -100 SetAV Chameleon 1 SetInteractionDisabled 1 SetVatsTargetable 0 endif
;PipBoy Flickering based on radius (separate from Damage). Moved to its own radius. if (HuntActive == 1 && PipBoyFlicker == 0 && GetDistance Player <= 800) ; Start the Flickerling Light quest StartQuest HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest if (HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.StartUp == 0) set HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.StartUp to 1 endif ; Start the heartbeat PlaySound HauntedGhostHuntHeartbeatSound set PipBoyFlicker to 1
elseif (PipBoyFlicker == 1 && GetDistance Player > 800) ; Stop the Flickering Light quest if (HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.StartUp == 1) set HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.StartUp to 0 set HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.FlickerStart to 0 set HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.FlickerTimer to 0 set HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.FlickerStage to 0 endif ;Stop the heartbeat StopSound HauntedGhostHuntHeartbeatSound StopQuest HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest set PipBoyFlicker to 0 endif
; Checks if the player is close by to the Ghost if (HuntActive == 1 && GetDistance Player <= 500) if (PlayerClose == 0) set damageBase to (PlayerREF.GetBaseActorValue Health / 10) set healthDamage to (damageBase * GetSecondsPassed) set PlayerClose to 1 ; Start a heartbeat sound - Moved to PipBoy flicker ;PlaySound HauntedGhostHuntHeartbeatSound endif
; If the player is in Medium Range, set the damage to 40 if (GetDistance Player <= 500 && GetDistance Player > 200 && healthRange != 1) set healthDamage to ((damageBase * 2) * GetSecondsPassed) ; double the damage set healthRange to 1 ;Print "Health Damage: " + $healthDamage
; If the player is in Close Range, set the damage to 80 elseif (GetDistance Player <= 200 && GetDistance Player > 60 && healthRange != 2) set healthDamage to ((damageBase * 4) * GetSecondsPassed) ; quadruple the damage set healthRange to 2 ;Print "Health Damage: " + $healthDamage
; If the player is right next to the ghost, just straight up kill them elseif (GetDistance Player <= 60 && Player.GetDead == 0) ;Print "Player Killed" Player.Kill PlaySound NPCDogGodNeckSnap StopSound HauntedGhostHuntHeartbeatSound set HuntActive to 0 endif
; Stop the damage if the player leaves the damage radius elseif (PlayerClose == 1 && GetDistance Player > 300) set PlayerClose to 0 set healthRange to 0
; Stop the heartbeat sound StopSound HauntedGhostHuntHeartbeatSound
endif
if (HuntActive == 1 && PlayerClose == 1) Player.DamageAV Health healthDamage endif
end

scn HauntedLightingTemplateCodeboxScript
; Updates the cell lighting template in the relevant cell if it broke ; This mostly happens when reloading into the cell, ie. if the player dies.
Begin GameMode
; If power is on, make sure the current cell's lighting template is On if (HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.PowerTurnedOn == 1)
if (GetInCell HauntedCasinoRestaurant == 1 && GetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoRestaurant != HauntedLightsOnTemplate) SetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoRestaurant HauntedLightsOnTemplate
elseif (GetInCell HauntedCasinoLobby == 1 && GetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoLobby != HauntedLightsOnTemplate) SetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoLobby HauntedLightsOnTemplate
elseif (GetInCell HauntedCasinoLounge == 1 && GetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoLounge != HauntedLightsOnTemplate) SetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoLounge HauntedLightsOnTemplate
elseif (GetInCell HauntedCasinoBasement == 1 && GetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoBasement != HauntedLightsOnBasementTemplate) SetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoBasement HauntedLightsOnBasementTemplate
elseif (GetInCell HauntedCasinoServiceRoute == 1 && GetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoServiceRoute != HauntedLightsOnBasementTemplate) SetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoServiceRoute HauntedLightsOnBasementTemplate
endif
; If power is off, make sure the current cell's lighting template is Off elseif (HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.PowerTurnedOn == 0)
if (GetInCell HauntedCasinoRestaurant == 1 && GetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoRestaurant != HauntedLightsOffRestaurantTemplate) SetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoRestaurant HauntedLightsOffRestaurantTemplate
elseif (GetInCell HauntedCasinoLobby == 1 && GetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoLobby != HauntedLightsOffTemplate) SetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoLobby HauntedLightsOffTemplate
elseif (GetInCell HauntedCasinoLounge == 1 && GetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoLounge != HauntedLightsOffTemplate) SetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoLounge HauntedLightsOffTemplate
elseif (GetInCell HauntedCasinoBasement == 1 && GetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoBasement != HauntedLightsOffBasementTemplate) SetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoBasement HauntedLightsOffBasementTemplate
elseif (GetInCell HauntedCasinoServiceRoute == 1 && GetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoServiceRoute != HauntedLightsOffBasementTemplate) SetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoServiceRoute HauntedLightsOffBasementTemplate
endif
endif
end

scn HauntedLoungeIndigoEscapeTriggerScript
; Trigger for the Escape from the Indigo Lounge
float loungeTimer short loungeLightStage short loungeLightStart short doOnce
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce == 0) HauntedIndigoLoungeDoorRef.SetOpenState 0 set HauntedIndigoLoungeDoorRef.GhostlyLock to 1 HauntedIndigoLoungeGhostHuntingRef.Disable set HauntedIndigoLoungeGhostHuntingRef.HuntActive to 0
PlaySound HauntedMusEventLobbyElevator 1
DisablePlayerControls
SetObjectiveCompleted HauntedMQ01 56 1
; Added an extra heartbeat stopper in case it sticks around StopSound HauntedGhostHuntHeartbeatSound
; Also added a stopper for the flicker quest if (HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.StartUp == 1) set HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.StartUp to 0 set HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.FlickerStart to 0 set HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.FlickerTimer to 0 set HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.FlickerStage to 0 endif StopQuest HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest
set loungeTimer to 4 set loungeLightStage to 1 set loungeLightStart to 1 set doOnce to 1 endif
end
Begin GameMode
if (loungeTimer > 0 && loungeLightStart == 1) set loungeTimer to loungeTimer - GetSecondsPassed endif
if (loungeLightStart == 1) if (loungeLightStage == 1 && loungeTimer < 3) HauntedCasLoungeLightsEnablerRef.Enable PlaySound OBJSwitchLights2D set loungeLightStage to 2
set loungeLightStage to 2 elseif (loungeLightStage == 2 && loungeTimer < 2.5) HauntedCasLoungeLightsEnablerRef.Disable set loungeLightStage to 3
set loungeLightStage to 3 elseif (loungeLightStage == 3 && loungeTimer < 2) HauntedCasLoungeLightsEnablerRef.Enable SetCellLightingTemplate HauntedCasinoLounge HauntedLightsOnTemplate set HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.PowerTurnedOn to 1 PlaySound OBJSwitchLights2D
; Get rid of all the Projector Stuff too HauntedIndigoLoungeProjectorStage02Ref.Disable HauntedIndigoLoungeProjectorRedRef.Disable HauntedIndigoLoungeProjectorSoundRef.Disable
HauntedIndigoLoungeHuntFireSoundsRef.Disable HauntedIndigoLoungeExitFireRef.Disable HauntedIndigoLoungeHuntMusRef.Disable
;SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 60 1 HauntedLoungeEscapeRadioRef.Enable EnablePlayerControls Autosave
;set HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.cameraDisabled to 0 ;showmessage HauntedCameraMessageFixed
set loungeLightStage to 4 set loungeTimer to 0 set loungeLightStart to 0 Disable endif endif
end

scn HauntedHotelPentHallucRoomFightTriggerScript
; Starts the final fight when the player approaches Warren in the penthouse bedroom
; 9344.0000 (Burn), 6144.0000 (Halluc), Difference of 3200 float yPosNew

short doOnce
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
DisablePlayerControls
SetObjectiveCompleted HauntedMQ01 101 1
; Mobster says something like "Vessel... kill." HauntedPenthouseHallucMobsterRef.SayTo HauntedPenthouseHallucWarrenRef HauntedMobsterLineToWarren 1 0
; Warren screams and plays an animation, end of that line starts the timer ;HauntedPenthouseHallucWarrenRef.Say <>
end
Begin Gamemode
if (startFight == 1 && doOnce == 0)
imod FadeInFromWhiteISFX imod NVWastelandNightHazyIS rimod HauntedISFXPast PlaySound UIVATSCameraOut HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnEffectsRef.Enable HauntedHotelPentFightFireSoundRef.Enable HauntedPenthouseHallucMusicRef.Disable
PlaySound HauntedMusEventPenthouseFire 1
SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 105 1
HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnWarrenRef.Enable HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnWarrenRef.SetGhost 1 HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnWarrenRef.SetRestrained 1
EnablePlayerControls ;1 0 0 1 1 1 1 ; Stop the player from pulling out their weapons, just for now (I recant that statement, let the weapons free!)
; Because the trigger is long and diagonal, I'll just need to move the player's pos relative to their current position set yPosNew to Player.GetPos Y + 3200 Player.SetPos Y yPosNew
Autosave ; Added autosave to reduce frustration
set doOnce to 1
endif
end

scn HauntedPenthouseFightCodeboxScript
; Controls the penthouse fight
; First Stage: Warren only. Ends when he reaches <50% health
; Second Stage: Warren goes away, corpses come out. Ends when Corpses are killed.
; Third Stage: Mobster Appears at stairs, Warren returns. Player fights Warren while avoiding the Mobster. Ends when Warren is killed.
short fightStarted
short fightStage short fightCorpseStage short fightHuntStage short fightEndStage
float fightTimer
short corpseStage
Begin GameMode
; Timer is reused for the different stages, cus it's nice and clean :) if (fightTimer > 0) set fightTimer to fightTimer - GetSecondsPassed endif
if (fightStarted == 1)
; First Stage (Warren) if (fightStage == 0) ; Stage 1 ends when Warren's health is < 50% if (HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnWarrenRef.GetAV Health <= (HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnWarrenRef.GetBaseAV Health / 2)) HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnWarrenRef.PlaceAtMe HauntedWooshExplosion 1 HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnWarrenRef.MoveTo HauntedPentBurnWarrenMoveMarker HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnWarrenRef.SetRestrained 1 HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnWarrenRef.ResetHealth ; Remove Warren's compass tick temporarily HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnWarrenRef.ForceActorDetectionValue -100
; Hide the Warren objective SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 105 0 Autosave
; Start a timer for the corpse reveal set fightTimer to 6 set fightStage to 1 endif
; Second Stage (Corpses) elseif (fightStage == 1)
; Timer controller for the Corpse Reveal ; Play the door bang before the corpses are revealed if (fightTimer < 5 && fightCorpseStage == 0) PlaySound EMTGhostWallBang
set fightCorpseStage to 1
; Release the corpses and play spooky sounds elseif (fightTimer < 3 && fightCorpseStage == 1) ;PlaySound DRSRotundaSecretAnimOpen PlaySound HauntedMusEventPenthouseCorpses 1 PlaySound NPCCentaurBreatheVox
HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnCorpseGangRef.Enable HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnSideDoor01Ref.SetOpenState 1 HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnSideDoor02Ref.SetOpenState 1
set fightCorpseStage to 2
; Update the objective to point at the corpses elseif (fightTimer < 2.8 && fightCorpseStage == 2) SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 106 1
set fightCorpseStage to 3 set fightTimer to 0 endif
; Check if all the Corpses are dead once the Corpses have been fully revealed if (fightCorpseStage == 3) ;if (HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.CorpsesDead >= 4) if (HauntedPenthouseCorpse01Ref.GetDead == 1 && HauntedPenthouseCorpse02Ref.GetDead == 1 && HauntedPenthouseCorpse03Ref.GetDead == 1 && HauntedPenthouseCorpse04Ref.GetDead == 1) SetObjectiveCompleted HauntedMQ01 106 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 105 1
set fightTimer to 5 set fightStage to 2 endif endif
; Third Stage (Mobster Hunts) elseif (fightStage == 2)
if (fightTimer < 4 && fightHuntStage == 0) HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnMobsterHuntingRef.Enable HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnMobsterHuntingRef.SetRestrained 1 HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnMobsterHuntingRef.SetGhost 1 HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnMobsterMarkRef.PlaceAtMe HauntedGasTrapFireBurst 1
set fightHuntStage to 1 elseif (fightTimer < 3 && fightHuntStage == 1) ; Just in case he's killed in the first stage by the player one-shotting him with a cheese weapon if (HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnWarrenRef.GetDead == 1) HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnWarrenRef.Resurrect endif HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnWarrenRef.MoveTo HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnWarrenMarkRef HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnWarrenMarkRef.PlaceAtMe HauntedWooshExplosion 1 HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnWarrenRef.SetRestrained 1 HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnWarrenRef.DamageAV Health (HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnWarrenRef.GetBaseAV Health / 2) PlaySound FXFireIncineratorLow
set fightHuntStage to 2 elseif (fightTimer < 2.5 && fightHuntStage == 2) HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnWarrenRef.SetRestrained 0 HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnMobsterHuntingRef.SetRestrained 0 set HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnMobsterHuntingRef.huntActive to 1
set fightHuntStage to 3 set fightTimer to 0 endif
if (HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnWarrenRef.GetAV Health <= 1) ; Kill him just in case he doesn't stay dead for whatever reason if (HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnWarrenRef.GetDead == 0) HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnWarrenRef.Kill endif HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnMobsterHuntingRef.SetRestrained 1 Set HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnMobsterHuntingRef.huntActive to 0 PlaySound NPCGhostRealDeath PlaySound NVDLC01AMBVaultEscapeStart
SetObjectiveCompleted HauntedMQ01 105 1
set fightTimer to 8 set fightStage to 3
endif
; End of fight elseif (fightStage == 3)
if (fightTimer < 7 && fightEndStage == 0) ;Make the Mobster go noooooooooooooooooooooooooo HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnMobsterHuntingRef.Say HauntedMobsterLineNooooo 1 ;HauntedPenthouseMobsterGhostHunting 1 PlaySound HauntedMobsterNooo
set fightEndStage to 1 elseif (fightTimer < 6 && fightEndStage == 1) HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnMobsterHuntingRef.PlaceAtMe HauntedGasTrapFireBurst 1
set fightEndStage to 2 elseif (fightTimer < 5.8 && fightEndStage == 2) HauntedPenthouseHallucBurnMobsterHuntingRef.Disable
set fightEndStage to 3 elseif (fightTimer < 5.5 && fightEndStage == 3) PlaySound UIVATSCameraOut imod FadeToWhiteAndBackQuickISFX
set fightEndStage to 4 elseif (fightTimer < 3.5 && fightEndStage == 4) Player.MoveTo HauntedPenthousePlayerMarker rimod NVWastelandNightHazyIS HauntedHotelPentFightMusRef.Disable HauntedHotelPentFightFireSoundRef.Disable PlaySound HauntedMusEventPenthouseFightOver 1
set fightEndStage to 5 elseif (fightTimer < 1 && fightEndStage == 5) SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 110 1 ;PlaySound HauntedMusEventPenthouseFightOver
; Ready Ryan's greeting at the end set HauntedMQ01.jobDone to 1
HauntedPenthouseShaneGhostRef.Enable HauntedPenthouseShaneGhostRef.SetRestrained 1
set fightEndStage to 6 set fightTimer to 0 endif
endif
endif
end

scn HauntedTestNPCHuntingGhostScript
short doOnce short HeartbeatSounded
short PushStage float PushTimer
Begin OnLoad
if (doOnce == 0) set PushTimer to 3 SetGhost 1 set doOnce to 1 endif
end
Begin GameMode
; Make the ghost throw things as it moves if (PushTimer > 0) set PushTimer to PushTimer - GetSecondsPassed endif
if (PushTimer <= 2.5 && PushStage == 0) PlaceAtMe FakeForceBall250 1 set PushStage to 1 elseif (PushTimer <= 1.5 && PushStage == 1) set PushStage to 0 set PushTimer to 3 endif
if (GetDistance Player <= 500 && HeartbeatSounded == 0)
if (HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.StartUp == 0) StartQuest HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest set HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.StartUp to 1 endif
PlaySound HauntedGhostHuntHeartbeatSound set HeartbeatSounded to 1 elseif (GetDistance Player > 500 && HeartbeatSounded == 1)
if (HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.StartUp == 1) set HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.StartUp to 0 set HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.FlickerStart to 0 set HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.FlickerTimer to 0 set HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest.FlickerStage to 0 StopQuest HauntedPipBoyFlickerQuest endif
StopSound HauntedGhostHuntHeartbeatSound set HeartbeatSounded to 0 endif
end

scn HauntedGhostFadingScript
; Variant of the Partially Visible Ghost that fades as the player approaches it
short fadeStart short fadeStage float fadeTimer
Begin OnLoad
if (GetInteractionDisabled == 0) SetGhost 1 SetActorAlpha 0.6 ForceActorDetectionValue -100 SetAV Chameleon 1 SetInteractionDisabled 1 SetVatsTargetable 0 endif
end
Begin Gamemode
if (GetDisabled == 0 && fadeStart == 0)
if (GetDistance Player <= 300)
set fadeStart to 1 set fadeTimer to 2
endif
if (GetInteractionDisabled == 0) SetGhost 1 SetActorAlpha 0.6 ForceActorDetectionValue -100 SetAV Chameleon 1 SetInteractionDisabled 1 SetVatsTargetable 0 endif
endif
if (fadeTimer > 0 && fadeStart == 1) set fadeTimer to fadeTimer - GetSecondsPassed endif
if (fadeStart == 1)
if (fadeTimer < 2 && fadeStage == 0) SetActorAlpha 0.5 set fadeStage to 1 elseif (fadeTimer < 1.9 && fadeStage == 1) SetActorAlpha 0.4 set fadeStage to 2 elseif (fadeTimer < 1.8 && fadeStage == 2) SetActorAlpha 0.3 set fadeStage to 3 elseif (fadeTimer < 1.7 && fadeStage == 3) SetActorAlpha 0.2 set fadeStage to 4 elseif (fadeTimer < 1.6 && fadeStage == 4) SetActorAlpha 0.1 set fadeStage to 5 elseif (fadeTimer < 1.5 && fadeStage == 5) Disable set fadeStart to 0 set fadeTimer to 0 endif endif
end

end

set goodbyeStage to 1 elseif (goodbyeTimer < 4.9 && goodbyeStage == 1) HauntedEndingHeadGhostRef.SetActorAlpha 0.4 HauntedEndingGhost01Ref.SetActorAlpha 0.4 HauntedEndingGhost02Ref.SetActorAlpha 0.4 HauntedEndingGhost03Ref.SetActorAlpha 0.4 HauntedEndingGhost04Ref.SetActorAlpha 0.4
set goodbyeStage to 2 elseif (goodbyeTimer < 4.8 && goodbyeStage == 2) HauntedEndingHeadGhostRef.SetActorAlpha 0.3 HauntedEndingGhost01Ref.SetActorAlpha 0.3 HauntedEndingGhost02Ref.SetActorAlpha 0.3 HauntedEndingGhost03Ref.SetActorAlpha 0.3 HauntedEndingGhost04Ref.SetActorAlpha 0.3
set goodbyeStage to 3 elseif (goodbyeTimer < 4.7 && goodbyeStage == 3) HauntedEndingHeadGhostRef.SetActorAlpha 0.2 HauntedEndingGhost01Ref.SetActorAlpha 0.2 HauntedEndingGhost02Ref.SetActorAlpha 0.2 HauntedEndingGhost03Ref.SetActorAlpha 0.2 HauntedEndingGhost04Ref.SetActorAlpha 0.2
set goodbyeStage to 4 elseif (goodbyeTimer < 4.6 && goodbyeStage == 4) HauntedEndingHeadGhostRef.SetActorAlpha 0.1 HauntedEndingGhost01Ref.SetActorAlpha 0.1 HauntedEndingGhost02Ref.SetActorAlpha 0.1 HauntedEndingGhost03Ref.SetActorAlpha 0.1 HauntedEndingGhost04Ref.SetActorAlpha 0.1
set goodbyeStage to 5 elseif (goodbyeTimer < 4.5 && goodbyeStage == 5) HauntedEndingHeadGhostRef.Disable HauntedEndingGhost01Ref.Disable HauntedEndingGhost02Ref.Disable HauntedEndingGhost03Ref.Disable HauntedEndingGhost04Ref.Disable
set goodbyeStage to 6 elseif (goodbyeTimer < 4 && goodbyeStage == 6) EnablePlayerControls ; Unlock the front door set HauntedCasLobbyEntDoorRef.GhostlyLock to 0

Disable MarkForDelete endif
endif
end

scn HauntedLobbyMetalDetectorTriggerScript
; Trigger that kicks off the lockdown & blackout
; (OLD) Power down sound: OBJBasementPwrOff ; Disable this: HauntedCasLobbyLightsEnablerRef
; Replace the sound with QSTHeliosTurbineIsBreakingDown ; rework timer so that the power goes out at the "cha-chunk" sound - happens at precisely 5.8 seconds into the sound
short blackoutStart int blackoutStage float blackoutTimer
short doOnce
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
if (blackoutStart == 0) HauntedCasLobbyDetectorLightsRef.Enable PlaySound HauntedFXMetalDetectorAlarm
; Enable the security shutters (maybe make them animated later) HauntedCasLobbyEntShuttersRef.Enable 0 HauntedCheckInShutterRef.Enable 0 HauntedCashierShutterRef.Enable 0 ; Disable the main door as well HauntedCasLobbyEntDoorRef.SetDestroyed 1
PlaySound DRSDeathclawCageClose SetObjectiveCompleted HauntedMQ01 20 1
set HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.firstEntrance to 1
PipBoyRadio 0
set blackoutStart to 1 set blackoutTimer to 10 endif
end
Begin Gamemode
if (blackoutTimer > 0 && blackoutStart == 1) set blackoutTimer to blackoutTimer - GetSecondsPassed endif
if (blackoutStart == 1) if (blackoutStage == 0 && blackoutTimer < 8) PlaySound QSTHeliosTurbineIsBreakingDown HauntedCasLobbyLightsEnablerRef.Disable
set blackoutStage to 1 elseif (blackoutStage == 1 && blackoutTimer < 7.5) HauntedCasLobbyLightsEnablerRef.Enable PlaySound OBJSwitchLights2D
set blackoutStage to 2 elseif (blackoutStage == 2 && blackoutTimer < 6) HauntedCasLobbyLightsEnablerRef.Disable
set blackoutStage to 3 elseif (blackoutStage == 3 && blackoutTimer < 5.5) HauntedCasLobbyLightsEnablerRef.Enable HauntedCasLobbyDetectorSparksRef.Enable PlaySound OBJSwitchLights2D
set blackoutStage to 4 elseif (blackoutStage == 4 && blackoutTimer < 2.2) HauntedCasLobbyLightsEnablerRef.Disable HauntedCasLobbyDetectorLightsRef.Disable HauntedCasLobbyDetectorSparksRef.Disable HauntedCasLobbyDetectorGhostRef.Enable PlaySound OBJSwitchLights2D print "Power turned off again, whoopsies!" set HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.PowerTurnedOn to 0 set HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.FlickeringLights to 0
set blackoutStage to 5 elseif (blackoutStage == 5 && blackoutTimer < 1) HauntedCasinoLobbyWandererRef.Enable HauntedCasLobbyDetectorGhostRef.Disable EnablePlayerControls PlaySound HauntedMusRevealCasino 1
;SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 30 1
set blackoutStage to 6 set blackoutStart to 0 Disable endif endif
end
Begin OnTriggerLeave Player
if (blackoutStart == 1 && doOnce == 0) DisablePlayerControls 1 1 0 1 0 1 1 set doOnce to 1 endif
end

scn HauntedGhostFollowerScript
; Script that makes the follower become invisible whenever the player turns around and sees them, with a slight delay
ref ghostRef float visTimer int visStart short visibility ; 0 = invisible, 1 = visible short isFollowing short doOnce short musOnce
Begin OnLoad
if (doOnce == 0) set ghostRef to this set doOnce to 1 endif
if (GetInterActionDisabled == 0) SetGhost 1 ; Make it invincible ForceActorDetectionValue -100 ; Remove the compass tick SetAV Chameleon 1 SetVatsTargetable 0 ; Make it un-targetable in VATS SetInteractionDisabled 1 ; Remove the ability to interact with the NPC endif
if (visibility == 0 && GetActorAlpha > 0) SetActorAlpha 0 elseif (visibility == 1 && GetActorAlpha != 0.8) SetActorAlpha 0.8 endif
end
Begin GameMode
; Make the settings persist with saves if (GetInterActionDisabled == 0) SetGhost 1 ; Make it invincible ForceActorDetectionValue -100 ; Remove the compass tick SetAV Chameleon 1 SetVatsTargetable 0 ; Make it un-targetable in VATS SetInteractionDisabled 1 ; Remove the ability to interact with the NPC endif
; Start the invisibility timer when the player sees the ghost if (Player.GetLOS ghostRef == 1 && visStart == 0 && visibility == 1) ;print "Follower Going Ghost" if (musOnce == 0) PlaySound HauntedMusEventFollowerSpotted set musOnce to 1 endif set visStart to 1 set visTimer to 2 endif
; Makes the ghost visible once the player looks away if (Player.GetLOS ghostRef == 0 && visibility == 0 && visStart == 0) ;print "Follower Going Visible" SetActorAlpha 0.8 set visibility to 1 endif
; Timer handler if (visTimer > 0 && visStart == 1) set visTimer to visTimer - (GetSecondsPassed) endif
; After a short (0.3s) delay, the ghost goes invisible if (visTimer < 1.7 && visStart == 1 && visibility == 1) ;print "Follower Is Invisible" set visibility to 0 SetActorAlpha 0 ; Let the timer finish its run so that the ghost doesn't immediately reappear elseif (visTimer < 0.1 && visStart == 1) set visStart to 0 set visTimer to 0 endif
end

scn HauntedServRouteRoom01TriggerScript
short doOnce
float eventTimer short eventStart short eventStage
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce == 0) set eventStart to 1 set eventTimer to 10
; Disable the rats for safety reasons HauntedServiceRouteRatsEnabler02Ref.Disable
set doOnce to 1 endif
end
Begin GameMode
if (eventStart == 1 && eventTimer > 0) set eventTimer to eventTimer - GetSecondsPassed endif
if (eventStart == 1)
if (eventTimer < 10 && eventStage == 0) PlaySound HauntedMusEventServiceRoute 1 imod BloodISFXd HauntedServRouteRoom01GhostRef.Enable 0 DisablePlayerControls 1 1 0 1 0 1 1
HauntedServRouteRoom01Door01Ref.SetOpenState 0 HauntedServRouteRoom01Door02Ref.SetOpenState 0
set eventStage to 1 elseif (eventTimer < 9.5 && eventStage == 1) HauntedServRouteRoomRedLightRef.Enable
set eventStage to 2 elseif (eventTimer < 7 && eventStage == 2) ; Ghost says "GO BACK" HauntedServRouteRoom01GhostRef.Say HauntedMobsterLineGoBack PlaySound HauntedMobsterGoBack
set eventStage to 3 elseif (eventTimer < 4 && eventStage == 3) HauntedServRouteRoomRedLightRef.Disable HauntedServRouteRoom01GhostRef.Disable HauntedServRouteRoomLightSparksRef.Enable HauntedServRouteRoomBoomMarkerRef.PlaceAtMe GaussImpactExplosion 1 HauntedServRouteRoomBoomMarkerRef.PlaySound3D HauntedFXLightBulbBreak01
set eventStage to 4 elseif (eventTimer < 3 && eventStage == 4) EnablePlayerControls HauntedServRouteRoom01Door01Ref.SetOpenState 1 ;HauntedServRouteRoom01Door02Ref.SetOpenState 1
rimod BloodISFXd
set eventStage to 5 set eventStart to 0 set eventTimer to 0 endif
endif
end

scn HauntedServiceRouteFollowerEnablerTriggerScript
; Enables the ghost follower in the service route
float hallTimer short hallStage short hallStart
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
HauntedServiceRouteGhostFollowerRef.Enable set HauntedServiceRouteGhostFollowerRef.isFollowing to 1
set hallTimer to 2 set hallStart to 1 ; Moved this + added a timer to hopefully fix a problem, maybe ;HauntedServiceRouteGhostFollowerRef.say HauntedMobsterLineShouldntBeHere 1 HauntedGhostServiceRouteFollower01 1 ;1 PlaySound HauntedMusMinor01 1
;Disable ;MarkForDelete
end
Begin Gamemode
if (hallStart == 1 && hallTimer > 0) set hallTimer to hallTimer - GetSecondsPassed endif
if (hallStart == 1)
if (hallTimer < 1.5 && hallStage == 0)
HauntedServiceRouteGhostFollowerRef.SayTo Player HauntedMobsterLineShouldntBeHere 1 PlaySound HauntedMobsterShouldntBeHere set hallStage to 1 elseif (hallTimer < 1.3 && hallStage == 1)
set hallTimer to 0 set hallStart to 0 set hallStage to 2
Disable MarkForDelete
endif
endif
end

scn HauntedHotelElevatorCodeboxTriggerScript
short elevStart short elevState float elevTimer
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
set elevStart to 1 set elevTimer to 40
end
Begin GameMode
if (elevStart == 1 && elevTimer > 0) set elevTimer to elevTimer - GetSecondsPassed endif
if (elevStart == 1) if (elevTimer < 20 && elevState == 0) HauntedHotelElevatorMovingSoundRef.Disable PlaySound HauntedFXElevatorStopSound
set elevState to 1 elseif (elevTimer < 19 && elevState == 1) PlaySound HauntedFXElevatorBellRing HauntedHotelElevatorMusicRef.Disable
set elevState to 2 elseif (elevTimer < 18.5 && elevState == 2) HauntedHotelElevatorGhostRef.Enable HauntedHotelElevatorGhostRef.SetRestrained 0
set elevState to 3 elseif (elevTimer < 18 && elevState == 3) HauntedHotelElevatorDoorRef.SetOpenState 1
set elevState to 4 elseif (elevTimer < 15 && elevState == 4) DisablePlayerControls 1 1 0 1 0 1 1 ;HauntedHotelElevatorGhostRef.MoveTo HauntedHotelElevatorGhostMarkerRef HauntedHotelElevatorGhostRef.SetPos Y 2189.3464 HauntedElevatorLightRedRef.Enable PlaySound HauntedMusEventShortScare imod BloodISFXd
set elevState to 5 elseif (elevTimer < 14 && elevState == 5) HauntedHotelElevatorGhostRef.Say HauntedMobsterLineDie 1 PlaySound HauntedMobsterDie
set elevState to 6 elseif (elevTimer < 13.5 && elevState == 6) PlaySound HauntedFXElevatorCrashing
set elevState to 7 elseif (elevTimer < 12.5 && elevState == 7) set HauntedHotelElevatorCodeboxRef.fallStart to 1 DisablePlayerControls rimod BloodISFXd imod FortCLaunch02 SetCameraShake 1.5 10
set elevState to 8 endif endif
end

scn HauntedServiceRouteFollowerStopTriggerScript
; Makes the Ghost Follower stop following and moves it to a specified marker in the Service Route
short doOnce ref markerRef
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce == 0) set markerRef to GetLinkedRef endif
if (HauntedServiceRouteGhostFollowerRef.isFollowing == 1 && HauntedServiceRouteGhostFollowerRef.GetDisabled == 0) set HauntedServiceRouteGhostFollowerRef.isFollowing to 0 HauntedServiceRouteGhostFollowerRef.evp
HauntedServiceRouteGhostFollowerRef.MoveTo markerRef HauntedServiceRouteGhostFollowerRef.SetRestrained 1 endif
end

scn HauntedSnowglobeScript
Begin OnAdd Player
;Check to show snowglobe messages if (VDialogueLucky38Penthouse.bFirstSnowGlobeMessage == 0) ShowMessage vSnowglobeFirstMessage set VDialogueLucky38Penthouse.bFirstSnowGlobeMessage to 1 elseif (VDialogueLucky38Penthouse.bFirstSnowGlobeMessage == 1) showmessage VSnowglobeMessage endif
; Enable the snowglobe in the Lucky 38 Suite HauntedLucky38SnowglobeRef.enable

RemoveMe

scn HauntedHotelElevatorFallCodeboxScript
; Holds the script for the falling motion of the elevator
; Pieces: ; HauntedHotelElevatorLightPartRef ; HauntedHotelElevatorMainPartRef ; HauntedHotelElevatorCardPartRef ; HauntedElevatorLightRedRef
; End Point: 3136 ; Teleport Point: 3800
short fallStart short imodApplied
float MainPosNew float LightPosNew float CeilPosNew float CardPosNew
Begin GameMode
if (fallStart == 1 && HauntedHotelElevatorMainPartRef.GetPos Z >= 3136) MainPosNew = (HauntedHotelElevatorMainPartRef.GetPos Z) - (320 * GetSecondsPassed) LightPosNew = (HauntedElevatorLightRedRef.GetPos Z) - (320 * GetSecondsPassed) CeilPosNew = (HauntedHotelElevatorLightPartRef.GetPos Z) - (320 * GetSecondsPassed) CardPosNew = (HauntedHotelElevatorCardPartRef.GetPos Z) - (320 * GetSecondsPassed)
HauntedHotelElevatorMainPartRef.SetPos Z MainPosNew Player.SetPos Z MainPosNew HauntedElevatorLightRedRef.SetPos Z LightPosNew HauntedHotelElevatorLightPartRef.SetPos Z CeilPosNew HauntedHotelElevatorCardPartRef.SetPos Z CardPosNew
endif
if (fallStart == 1 && imodApplied == 0 && HauntedHotelElevatorMainPartRef.GetPos Z <= 3800) imod MQ08AllBlackedOutISFX rimod FortCLaunch02 set imodApplied to 1 elseif (fallStart == 1 && HauntedHotelElevatorMainPartRef.GetPos Z <= 3136)
Player.MoveTo HauntedHotel01ElevatorMarkerRef set fallStart to 0
endif
end

scn HauntedHotel01ElevatorTriggerScript
; Wakes up the player after the elevator crash
float wakeTimer short wakeState
short moveShadow float shadowPos
float playerHealth
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
rimod MQ08AllBlackedOutISFX imod FadeInFromBlack10sISFX Player.AddScriptPackage NVDLC01PlayerWakesUp
set playerHealth to (Player.GetAV Health * 0.60) Player.DamageAV Health playerHealth
set wakeTimer to 6 set wakeState to 1
end
Begin Gamemode
if (wakeTimer > 0 && wakeState > 0) set wakeTimer to wakeTimer - GetSecondsPassed endif
if (wakeTimer <= 3 && wakeState == 1) set moveShadow to 1
set wakeState to 2 elseif (wakeTimer <= 1 && wakeState == 2) Player.RemoveScriptPackage EnablePlayerControls Autosave
set wakeState to 0 set wakeTimer to 0 ;Quest update ;SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 70 1 Disable endif
if (moveShadow == 1) if (HauntedHotel01ElevatorShadow01Ref.GetPos X > 1384) set shadowPos to HauntedHotel01ElevatorShadow01Ref.GetPos X - (100 * GetSecondsPassed) HauntedHotel01ElevatorShadow01Ref.SetPos X shadowPos
elseif (HauntedHotel01ElevatorShadow01Ref.GetPos X <= 1384) HauntedHotel01ElevatorShadow01Ref.Disable set moveShadow to 0 endif endif
end
