ESP.ORIGINAL: Warning

--- ALERT ---
Lockdown security shutters at Front Desks (Cashier's and Check-In) have been lifted, however due to the nature of the security alert, the front door's security shutter can only be lifted by an administrator. Please contact your administrator to confirm that the security incident has been handled and that the front doors can be opened again.
The security shutters will automatically open in the case of an emergency, such as power loss or fire. Please refrain from causing an incident to open the doors. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT:
--- 警报 ---
前台(收银台和登记处)的安全活动护窗已经被解除，但是由于安全警报的性质，前门的安全活动护窗只能由管理员解除。请联系您的管理员，确认安全事件已经得到处理，前门可以重新打开。
在紧急情况下，如停电或火灾，安全活动护窗会自动打开。请不要在开门时造成意外。谢谢您！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Warren's "Activities"

Warren's been getting weirder and weirder ever since we came to this place, and that's saying something since this place is already weird as hell. We're all seeing things, shapes moving out of the corners of our eyes, but we're all too afraid to admit it to each other. Warren though, he's talking like he's found something up in that penthouse of his. Says it has to do with the things we're seeing, says that it can make them go away. Unless the thing he found is a stash of anti-psychotics, I don't think it's gonna help.
- Jackson
ESP.TRADUIT:
自从我们来到这里以后，华伦就变得越来越奇怪，这也说明了一些问题，因为这地方已经很诡异了。我们都看到了一些东西，某种形状从我们的眼角移开，但我们都太害怕向对方承认。但是华伦，他说的好像他在他的顶层公寓里发现了什么一样。说这和我们看到的东西有关，说这能让它们消失。除非他找到的是抗精神病药的藏匿处，否则我觉得这没用。
- 杰克逊

ESP.ORIGINAL: Security Logs

--- ALERT ---
This system has been damaged and needs repairs. Long-term memory retrieval unavailable. Some information may be missing. Please contact Administration.
Displaying most recent system log:
[ERROR]: Front detector alarm triggered
[ERROR]: Power surge detected, system going offline
[ERROR]: System back online
ESP.TRADUIT:
--- 警报 ---
这个系统已经损坏，需要修理。长期记忆检索不可用，有些信息可能缺失。请联系管理部门。
显示最近的系统日志：
[错误]：前端探测器报警触发
[错误]：检测到电涌，系统脱机
[错误]：系统重新上线

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gone Crazy

Warren's gone insane. He's called all of us to the penthouse, but like hell am I going up there. I've heard what he's been doing, the shit he's been up to up there. He tried to hide them, the bodies, but I saw them. The eyes...
I'm holding out here with some of my boys. If that bastard wants to get to us, he'll have to come get us.
- Jackson
ESP.TRADUIT:
华伦已经疯了。他叫我们都去顶楼，但我才不要上去呢。我听说了他的所作所为，他在那里干的那些破事。他想把尸体藏起来，但我看到了。眼睛...
我和我的几个兄弟在这里等着，如果那个混蛋想干掉我们，他就得自己来。
- 杰克逊

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ghost Hunting Opportunity
The Ghost Files Radio Broadcast says that there's a job opening for a ghost hunter. The speaker said to go to the Strip Ruins, which can be entered through a location near the El Rey Motel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 鬼魂档案电台广播说有一个捉鬼人的职位空缺。发言者说要去长街废墟，可以通过埃尔·雷汽车旅馆附近的一个位置进入。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep Out!

To any of you assholes who have somehow worked up the courage to come down here: DON'T OPEN THE FUCKING DOOR. Whoever keeps turning the power off, good luck doing that now. It's locked, and I'm not telling you where the key is down here. Don't look for it.
Fuck off.
- Jackson
ESP.TRADUIT:
对于你们这些不知何故鼓起勇气来到这里的混蛋： 不要打开该死的门。不管是谁一直关掉电源，祝你好运。锁上了，我不会告诉你钥匙在哪的。不要找它。
滚蛋。
- 杰克逊

ESP.ORIGINAL: Late Night Guests

Apparently some guests have taken to visiting the lounge in the off hours of the night, when the lounge is explicitly closed. They must be sneaking in, I never hear the doors open. Just doing my job and start to hear chattering in the next room, and there they are. They act like nothing's wrong, but at least they leave when I tell them to. I swear, if they keep popping in like this, I'm calling security and getting them thrown out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很明显，有些客人喜欢在晚上休息的时间来参观酒廊，因为这个时候酒廊是明确关闭的。他们一定是偷偷溜进来的，我从来没听见门开过。我只是在做我的工作，然后听到隔壁的人在聊天，他们就来了。他们表现得若无其事，但至少我让他们走的时候他们就走了。我发誓，如果他们再这样闯进来，我就叫保安把他们赶出去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Projector Malfunctions

Feels like this damn projector is cursed, it keeps powering up in the dead of night. I've checked the whole machine up and down, there's nothing wrong with the machine. Might be some sort of power surge at night that's somehow turning it on. Scares the hell out of me when I'm cleaning the place up and suddenly The Last Stand starts up on the screen. Gonna try and convince the higher ups to do a full electrical survey of the building, see if they can't find the root of the problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感觉这该死的放映机被诅咒了，夜深人静的时候还在供电。我把整台机器上上下下都检查过了，没有什么问题。可能是晚上的某种电涌让它启动了。当我在打扫房间的时候，突然屏幕上开始播放《背水一战》，吓死我了。我去说服高层对大楼做一次全面的电气检查，看看他们能不能找到问题的根源。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kingman, Arizona

Kingman, Arizona
RYAN: Lots of potential for haunting investigations here, that place has a lot of ghost rumors floating around it. I hear they've got a canyon with echoing ghostly cries, an old hotel where spirits roam the halls, even a collapsed mineshaft where dozens of workers died! It's a goldmine!
SHANE: That's all well and good, but there's the big issue of, oh I don't know, THE LEGION. We can't go there without getting our heads chopped off by those maniacs.
RYAN: Fine, you make a good point. We'll shelf that idea for now, but if the Legion situation improves in the future, it'd be a great spot.
ESP.TRADUIT:
金曼，亚利桑那
赖安：这里有很多潜在的鬼魂调查，那个地方有很多鬼魂的传言。我听说那里有一个回荡着鬼魂叫声的峡谷，一个鬼魂在大厅里游荡的老旅馆，甚至还有一个坍塌的矿井，数十名工人丧生其中！这是一座金矿！
沙恩：这很好，但是有一个大问题，哦，我不知道，军团，我们去那里肯定会被那些疯子砍头的。
赖安：好吧，你说得有道理。我们暂时搁置这个想法，但如果军团的情况在未来有所改善，这将是一个很好的地点。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
First day staying at Gally's and already the staff has fucked up. Right after telling me about this study terminal and how all guest logs are cleared after their stay, I find a bunch of logs from the previous guest. Guess they must've forgotten, and they were very quick to delete them once I pointed it out.
I only got a glimpse at the logs, but whoever was staying here complained about noises at night, apparently sounded like someone moving around. Probably just some janitor trying to sneak away something valuable, but I can't help but be put on edge by it. I'm not going to be staying here for long, that's for sure.
(And if you're a staff member reading this: train your employees better. This is ridiculous.)
ESP.TRADUIT:
第一天住在加利酒店就已经被员工搞砸了。在告诉我这个学习终端的情况以及所有客人入住后的日志是如何清除的之后，我发现了一堆前一位客人的日志。我猜他们一定是忘记了，我一指出来，他们就迅速删除了。
我只瞥了一眼日志，但住在这里的人抱怨晚上有噪音，显然听起来像是有人在走动。可能是某个门卫想偷些值钱的东西，但我还是忍不住紧张。我不会在这里待太久的，这是肯定的。
(如果你是一名正在读这篇文章的员工，那就更好地培训你的员工吧。这太愚蠢了。)

ESP.ORIGINAL:
wow i cant believe this terminal still works. guess i should thank jackson after all
dipshits living here before didnt know how to turn it on i guess. no wonder it was easy as fuck to kick them out, bet they didnt even make it up to the penthouse.
this place is the pad of kings. got a view of the whole of vegas, can see the whole fucking desert. this is gonna be the start of something big.
ESP.TRADUIT:
哇，真不敢相信这个终端还能用，看来我还是该感谢杰克逊
我猜以前住在这里的笨蛋都不知道怎么开机。难怪把他们赶出去这么容易，我敢打赌他们连顶层公寓都没上。
这里是国王的宫殿。能看到整个维加斯，还能看到整个沙漠。这将是一件大事的开始。

ESP.ORIGINAL: only a few left now. barricaded in the hotel. thats okay. they wont last long. we are coming for them. then itll be complete. then ill have what he promised me. then itll all be over. then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在只剩下几个了，躲在酒店。没关系，他们没多久了，我们要去抓他们了。然后一切就完成了，那么我就会得到他答应我的东西，然后一切就都结束了。然后。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodsprings, Nevada

Goodsprings, Nevada
RYAN: Rumors say that this quaint little town in the middle of the desert is home to a great many spirits, mostly around the old graveyard. Could be a good trip.
SHANE: Eh, I'm not feeling it. Exterior locations never really give us anything good, wind is too strong to hear anything and we never get any actual manifestations. I say we go to Vegas first.
RYAN: Yeah, you're right. Besides, I'd probably want to steer clear of that place anyways. If the radio is anything to go off of, someone got shot there very recently. Wouldn't want to anger a new spirit.
ESP.TRADUIT:
清泉镇，内华达
赖安：有传言说这个位于沙漠中心的古色古香的小镇是很多鬼魂的家园，大部分都在古老的墓地附近。可能会是一次不错的旅行。
沙恩：嗯，我没感觉。外景从来没有给我们带来什么好东西，风太大，听不到任何声音，我们从来没有得到任何实际的表现。我建议我们先去维加斯。
赖安：是，你说得对。再说了，反正我也不想去那个地方。如果无线电有什么问题的话，那就是最近有人在那里中枪了。我可不想激怒一个新灵魂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gally's, Las Vegas

Gally's Hotel & Casino, Las Vegas
RYAN: This place is PRIME for ghost hunting, hell it's one that people were investigating before the war! This was in some of the earliest magazines we found, this is the perfect location.
SHANE: I think it could be a bit dangerous, from what I heard Vegas used to be crawling with raiders and tribals. Whose to say there aren't some still squatting inside the place?
RYAN: That's why we bring guns, Shane. Besides, I'm willing to bet most people avoid that place because of the ghosts. The places we investigate are always empty, it'll be fine.
SHANE: Alright, alright. I've always wanted to go to Vegas anyhow, so why not. It'll be a fun trip.
ESP.TRADUIT:
加利大赌场酒店
赖安：这里是捉鬼的好地方，这可是人们战前就在调查的地方！这是我们找到的一些最早的杂志，一个完美的地点。
沙恩：我觉得可能有点危险，我听说维加斯以前到处都是掠夺者和部落。谁说不会有人还蹲在里面呢？
赖安：所以我们要带枪，沙恩。再说了，我敢打赌大多数人都怕鬼，不敢去那个地方的。我们调查的地方都是空的，不会有事的。
沙恩：好吧，好吧。我一直都想去维加斯，为什么不呢，这将是一次有趣的旅行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sierra Madre

Siera Madre, ???
RYAN: Alright hear me out -
SHANE: No.
RYAN: C'mon, it's literally called "the city of the dead"! That's perfect!
SHANE: Yeah, you know what else it's called? A death trap, because that's what it is! No one even knows where it is, and even if we DID somehow manage to find it, we'd just die. I'm vetoing this idea, there's no way we're going there.
RYAN: Fine. Would've been cool, though. Imagine we came back with actual evidence from the real Sierra Madre! But, no, you're right.
ESP.TRADUIT:
马德雷山脉， ???
赖安：好吧，听我说...
沙恩：不。
赖安：拜托，它的字面意思是“死亡之城”！太完美了！
沙恩：是的，但你知道它还叫什么吗？一个死亡陷阱，因为它就是这样！甚至没人知道它在哪里，即使我们设法找到它，我们也会死。我要否决这个想法，我们不可能这么做。
赖安：好吧，不过要是那样可太酷了。想象一下我们从真正的马德雷山脉带回了确凿的证据！但是，你是对的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Overlook Hotel

Overlook Hotel, Colorado
RYAN: This place is a classic for ghost hunters. Even before the war, people told stories of this place. And even better, from what I've heard, it's outside of Legion territory, so perfectly safe!
SHANE: I don't know, it's still a bit too close for my tastes. Plus, we'd still have to travel through Arizona to get there.
RYAN: We won't be spending too much time there, and the Legion will probably leave us alone, I think. Come on man, this place is LEGENDARY, we gotta go there!
SHANE: Fine, we'll put it on the list, but AFTER Vegas, okay?
RYAN: Yes! Alright, great!
ESP.TRADUIT:
眺望酒店，科罗拉多
赖安：这个地方是捉鬼者的经典去处。甚至在战争之前，人们就开始讲述这个地方的故事。更棒的是，据我所知，它在军团的地盘之外，非常安全！
沙恩：我不知道，对我来说还是太近了。而且，我们还得穿越亚利桑那州才能到达那里。
赖安：我们不会在那里花太多时间的，我想军团可能会放过我们。来吧，伙计，这个地方是传奇，我们必须去那里！
沙恩：好吧，我们会把它列在单子上的，但是在维加斯之后，行吗？
赖安：好！好的，太好了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Camera Film
The Strip Ruins
GREETING
{Staff Ghost}I must be getting back to work. Please... go.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Staff Ghost}我得回去工作了。请...走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hotel Staff [02044C33] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeGhostGeneric\HauntedDia_GREETING_00047B19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Guest Ghost 1}You're a new guest? Funny, I don't recognize you...
ESP.TRADUIT: {Guest Ghost 1}你是新来的客人？有趣，我都不认识你了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Guest [02045C3D] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeGhostGeneric\HauntedDia_GREETING_00047B1A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Guest Ghost 2}The hotel feels... cold? Should it feel cold?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Guest Ghost 2}酒店感觉...冷？应该觉得冷吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Guest [02045C3F] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeGhostGeneric\HauntedDia_GREETING_00047B1B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Guest Ghost 3}You don't look like you belong here... is something wrong?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Guest Ghost 3}你看起来不像是这里的人...出什么事了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Guest [02045C41] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeGhostGenericF\HauntedDia_GREETING_00047B1C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Ryan, Radio Lobby 1}Hey, what the hell just happened in there? Are you alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Ryan, Radio Lobby 1}嘿，刚才到底发生了什么事？你还好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_GREETING_00058371_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The whole casino's power just shut off, and it looks like some security gate closed the front door. What happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 整个赌场的电力都断了，好像有个安全闸门把前门关上了。发生什么事了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_GREETING_00058371_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Ryan, Radio Lobby 2}Oh hey, your signal's back. I see power's back on, how did things go down there?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Ryan, Radio Lobby 2}噢，嘿，你的信号回来了。我看到电力恢复了，那边情况如何？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_GREETING_00058379_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Ryan, Lounge 1}There's your signal. I detected a pretty big activity spike back there, but I'm sure it was fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Ryan, Lounge 1}这是你的信号。我检测到那里有一个非常大的活动高峰，但我确定没事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_GREETING_0005887E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess that means you're in the Indigo Lounge, right? A keycard should be there somewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜这意味着你在靛蓝酒廊，对吧？密钥卡应该在某个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_GREETING_0005887E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Ryan, Lounge 2}Hey, you're back! What the hell happened in there? Activity just spiked massively!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Ryan, Lounge 2}嘿，你回来了！里面到底发生了什么？活动急剧增加！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_GREETING_00058887_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Ryan, Radio Hotel 01}Oh, shit, the signal! You're back! You've been gone for an hour!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Ryan, Radio Hotel 01}噢，该死，信号！你回来了！你已经消失一个小时了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_GREETING_00058D93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You took the elevator, and a few seconds later there was a massive spike, and then you just vanished!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你坐上电梯，几秒钟之后出现了巨大激增，然后你就消失了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_GREETING_00058D93_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell happened?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_GREETING_00058D93_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Ryan, Player Fired}Go away, you're obviously not going to be of any help here.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Ryan, Player Fired}走开，你显然帮不上什么忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_GREETING_00056F12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Ryan, first meeting}{Under breath}Oh thank god, someone came. {Full}Hello there! I assume you heard the broadcast about the ghost hunting opportunity? Well, you came to the right place!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Ryan, first meeting}{Under breath}噢谢天谢地，有人来了。{Full}你好啊！我猜你听到了关于捉鬼机会的广播吧？你来对地方了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_GREETING_00049EBF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You, uh... are here to help, right?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_GREETING_00049EBF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: StopQuest HauntedRadioQuest HauntedGhostHunterBroadcastRef.Disable
{Ryan, not hired}Have you decided if you're going to help me or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Ryan, not hired}你决定好要不要帮我了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_GREETING_00049EC9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Ryan, waiting to go in}Hey, did you have more questions or are you ready to go in?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Ryan, waiting to go in}嘿，你还有其他问题吗，还是准备好进去了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_GREETING_00049EED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Ryan, player going in}Go on in, I've got to watch the equipment.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Ryan, player going in}进去吧，我得看着设备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_GREETING_0004A404_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Ryan, quest not complete}What are you doing out here? You can't have found him yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Ryan, quest not complete}你在这里做什么？你肯定还没找到他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_GREETING_00056A17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Ryan, Quest Complete}You're back! What happened? I lost contact ages ago, did the radio break or something?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Ryan, Quest Complete}你回来了！发生了什么事？我断联好久了，是无线电坏了还是怎么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_GREETING_00063211_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait... where... where is Shane?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_GREETING_00063211_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted HauntedMQ01 150 1
{Ryan, Quest Done}Oh, hey. Did you need anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Ryan, Quest Done}噢，嘿。你还需要什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_GREETING_0006412E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: RadioHello
Uh, hello Mojave. My name's Ryan, I'm a ghost hunter, and guess what? I'm hiring!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，你好莫哈维。我叫赖安，我是个捉鬼人，你猜怎么着？我在招人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ghost Files Radio Broadcast [020499C0] (mod) Quest : ([02049EB9]HauntedRadioQuest) Ghost Files Radio Broadcast EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedRad_RadioHello_00049EBA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: if (HauntedDialogueQuest.RadioBroadcastHeard == 0) set HauntedDialogueQuest.RadioBroadcastHeard to 1 ShowMap HauntedStripEntranceMapRef endif
I'm looking for armed, passionate, and most importantly brave individuals to hunt ghosts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在寻找有武装，有激情，最重要的是有勇气的人来狩猎鬼魂！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ghost Files Radio Broadcast [020499C0] (mod) Quest : ([02049EB9]HauntedRadioQuest) Ghost Files Radio Broadcast EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedRad_RadioHello_00049EBC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you believe in ghosts, which you should, please, come meet me in the old New Vegas Strip ruins. Just outside the, uh, real Strip, I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你相信有鬼魂，你也应该相信，请到旧新拉斯维加斯长街的废墟来见我。就在真正的长街外面，我猜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ghost Files Radio Broadcast [020499C0] (mod) Quest : ([02049EB9]HauntedRadioQuest) Ghost Files Radio Broadcast EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedRad_RadioHello_00049EBB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a very urgent matter, so please, if you're interested, come quickly. I, uh... really need the help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一件非常紧急的事情，所以如果你有兴趣，请尽快来。我，呃...真的很需要帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ghost Files Radio Broadcast [020499C0] (mod) Quest : ([02049EB9]HauntedRadioQuest) Ghost Files Radio Broadcast EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedRad_RadioHello_00049EBD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yeah, and this message will repeat. Come join us! Please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，对了，这条信息会重复的。来加入我们吧！拜托。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ghost Files Radio Broadcast [020499C0] (mod) Quest : ([02049EB9]HauntedRadioQuest) Ghost Files Radio Broadcast EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedRad_RadioHello_00049EBE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: HauntedMobsterLineDie
DIE.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeMobsterGhost\HauntedDia_HauntedMobsterL_000384A4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: HauntedMobsterLineGoBack
GO. BACK.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeMobsterGhost\HauntedDia_HauntedMobsterL_000384AA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: HauntedGhostHotelStaffIntro
Are you... a new guest? Yes, you must be. Otherwise how would you... be here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是...新客人？是的，你一定是。不然你怎么...在这里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hotel Staff [02044C33] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeGhostGeneric\HauntedDia_HauntedGhostHot_00047B10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you... have a room yet?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hotel Staff [02044C33] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeGhostGeneric\HauntedDia_HauntedGhostHot_00047B10_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
;SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 71 0
HauntedHotel02HallucinationStaffGhostRef.RemoveScriptPackage HauntedHallucinationStaffGhostTalkPackage
What are you talking about? Where am I?
{Confused}You are in the Mirage Hotel.{Second guessing} Right? We must be.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Confused}你在幻景酒店。{Second guessing}对吧？我们一定是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hotel Staff [02044C33] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeGhostGeneric\HauntedDia_HauntedGhostHot_00047B12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This must be your key, then? I'm not sure... which room it goes to, but I'm sure you'll be able to find it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么这一定是你的钥匙了？我不确定...是哪个房间的，但我相信你能找到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hotel Staff [02044C33] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeGhostGeneric\HauntedDia_HauntedGhostHot_00047B12_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you... enjoy your stay. I'm going to... to work. Yes, that's it. Work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你...住得愉快。我要...去工作。是的，就是这样。工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hotel Staff [02044C33] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeGhostGeneric\HauntedDia_HauntedGhostHot_00047B12_3.ogg

I don't have a room here, no.
That's not right... why else would you be here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不对啊...不然你怎么会在这里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hotel Staff [02044C33] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeGhostGeneric\HauntedDia_HauntedGhostHot_00047B14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This must be your key, then? I'm not sure... which room it goes to, but I'm sure you'll be able to find it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么这一定是你的钥匙了？我不确定...是哪个房间的，但我相信你能找到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hotel Staff [02044C33] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeGhostGeneric\HauntedDia_HauntedGhostHot_00047B14_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you... enjoy your stay. I'm going to... to work. Yes, that's it. Work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你...住得愉快。我要...去工作。是的，就是这样。工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hotel Staff [02044C33] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeGhostGeneric\HauntedDia_HauntedGhostHot_00047B14_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.AddItem HauntedHotel02RoomKey 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 71 1 HauntedHotel02HallucinationStaffGhostRef.AddScriptPackage HauntedHallucinationStaffGhostWorkPackage Set HauntedHotel02HallucinationStaffGhostRef.BatmanActReady to 1
Are you a ghost or something?
I... don't think I am.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hotel Staff [02044C33] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeGhostGeneric\HauntedDia_HauntedGhostHot_00047B17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Suddenly angry}Why? What do you know? What happened to me?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Suddenly angry}为什么？你知道什么？我怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hotel Staff [02044C33] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeGhostGeneric\HauntedDia_HauntedGhostHot_00047B17_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Shaking back to reality}I'm terribly sorry, I shouldn't be... yelling at the guests. You must be a guest, after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Shaking back to reality}非常抱歉，我不应该...对着客人大吼大叫。你终究是客人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hotel Staff [02044C33] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeGhostGeneric\HauntedDia_HauntedGhostHot_00047B17_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This must be your key, then? I'm not sure... which room it goes to, but I'm sure you'll be able to find it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么这一定是你的钥匙了？我不确定...是哪个房间的，但我相信你能找到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hotel Staff [02044C33] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeGhostGeneric\HauntedDia_HauntedGhostHot_00047B17_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you... enjoy your stay. I'm going to... to work. Yes, that's it. Work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你...住得愉快。我要...去工作。是的，就是这样。工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hotel Staff [02044C33] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeGhostGeneric\HauntedDia_HauntedGhostHot_00047B17_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.AddItem HauntedHotel02RoomKey 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 71 1 HauntedHotel02HallucinationStaffGhostRef.AddScriptPackage HauntedHallucinationStaffGhostWorkPackage Set HauntedHotel02HallucinationStaffGhostRef.BatmanActReady to 1
I heard your broadcast, and I'm here for the ghost hunting position.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听到你的广播了，我是来应聘捉鬼的工作的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Radio signal heard}Fantastic! I really needed your help, so I'm very glad you came.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Radio signal heard}太棒了！我真的需要你的帮助，所以我很高兴你能来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanFirs_00049EC1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and as an extra signing bonus, here's a custom Ghost Hunting jacket, just for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，作为额外的签约奖励，这是定制的捉鬼夹克，专门给你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanFirs_00049EC1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess before we get into it, do you have any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想在我们开始之前，你有什么问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanFirs_00049EC1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
set HauntedDialogueQuest.PlayerHired to 1 Player.AddItem HauntedOutfitGhostHunter 1
HauntedGhostHunterBroadcastRef.SetBroadcastState 0
{Radio not heard}Oh, so you just stumbled over here? Well, I guess if you want to join anyways, that's better than nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Radio not heard}噢，所以你是无意中过来的吗？我觉得如果你想加入，总比没人加入强。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanFirs_00049EC2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and as an extra signing bonus, here's a custom Ghost Hunting jacket, just for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，作为额外的签约奖励，这是定制的捉鬼夹克，专门给你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanFirs_00049EC2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess before we get into it, do you have any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想在我们开始之前，你有什么问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanFirs_00049EC2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
set HauntedDialogueQuest.PlayerHired to 1 Player.AddItem HauntedOutfitGhostHunter 1
HauntedGhostHunterBroadcastRef.SetBroadcastState 0
I didn't hear any radio broadcast, but if you're saying I can be a ghost hunter, I'm in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没听到任何广播，但如果你说我能成为捉鬼人，我就加入。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, ghost hunting? Like, actual ghosts?
Well, yeah, that's what the name implies. Look, I can tell you all about what we do if you agree to help me out, deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，对，这名字就是这个意思。听着，如果你同意帮我，我可以告诉你我们要做什么，行吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanFirs_00049EC6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll need to think about this before I agree to anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我同意任何事之前，我都需要考虑一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're already here, you couldn't have thought of that on the way over?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经来了，你就不能在来的路上考虑吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanFirs_00049EC7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, fine, take your time, but please hurry up. This is very important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，慢慢来，但请快点。这非常重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanFirs_00049EC7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seriously? Hurry it up, I don't have time for this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？快点，我没时间跟你耗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanFirs_00049EC8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you telling me that ghosts are real?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说鬼魂是真实存在的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We live in a world with giant radioactive scorpions and nigh-immortal mutated humans of two different varieties, and ghosts are too much to believe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们生活的世界里有巨大的放射性蝎子和近乎不朽的两种不同品种的变种人类，而鬼魂让人难以置信？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanFirs_00049ECB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, ghosts are real, and there's been plenty of proof of them, both documented and anecdotal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，鬼魂是真实存在的，而且有大量的证据证明它们存在，有记录的，也有传闻的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanFirs_00049ECB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is this place?
We're standing in a section of the Las Vegas Strip that most people forgot exists. There were more than just four casinos, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们正站在拉斯维加斯长街的一个区域，大多数人都忘记了它的存在。你知道，当时不止有四家赌场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanFirs_00049ECD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The place we're investigating is right across the street - Gally's Hotel and Casino. Big place, lots of history. I'll tell you all about it later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们调查的地方就在街对面，加利大赌场酒店。很大的地方，有很多历史。我以后再告诉你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanFirs_00049ECD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough questions for now. What can you tell me about this job?
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题到此为止。关于这份工作你能告诉我些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, well to start off, I may or may not have lied a bit in the broadcast. This isn't just a job as a ghost hunter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，首先，我可能在广播中撒了一点谎，也可能没有。这不仅仅是一份捉鬼人的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanFirs_00049ECF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see, I have a partner, my friend Shane. We've investigated tons of places, and that casino across the street was next on our list.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，我有个搭档，我的朋友沙恩。我们调查了很多地方，街对面那家赌场是我们的下一个目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanFirs_00049ECF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shane went in and I stayed out here to monitor the equipment, same thing we usually do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沙恩进去了，我在外面监视设备，我们通常都是这么做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanFirs_00049ECF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But something went wrong this time. I haven't heard from him in a while, and I'm worried that he's hurt. That's why I need your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是这次出了问题。我有段时间没有他的消息了，我担心他受了伤。所以我才需要你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanFirs_00049ECF_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You will still be investigating, though! You'll have the jacket, the camera, the whole deal. A real ghost hunter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，你仍将继续调查！你会得到夹克，相机，所有的东西。一个真正的捉鬼人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanFirs_00049ECF_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
I thought I introduced myself just fine in the broadcast. I'm Ryan, I'm a ghost hunter. Yes, it's a real job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我在广播里的自我介绍还不错。我是赖安，我是一个捉鬼人。是的，这是一份真正的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanFirs_00049ED1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to know more, I can tell you later, alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想知道更多，我可以稍后告诉你，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanFirs_00049ED1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do I get for doing this job?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做这份工作能得到什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, right, payment. Well, for one, you'll be getting a similar jacket to the one I'm wearing. It looks pretty good, right? {Asking}Right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，对了，付款。首先，你会得到一件和我现在穿的差不多的夹克。看起来很不错，对吧？{Asking}是吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanFirs_00049ED3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and also 2,000 caps. Plus a bonus if you manage to get extra evidence, though we'll discuss that once you take the job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，还有2000瓶盖。如果你能找到额外的证据，还有奖金，不过你接受工作后我们再讨论这个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanFirs_00049ED3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some questions about you.
That's enough questions for now.
HauntedRyanQuestionsGhosts
I need to go.
{Quest not complete}Okay, but please hurry back.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Quest not complete}好的，但请快点回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanGood_00049EF3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Quest Complete}Okay, goodbye.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanGood_00064135_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready to go into the casino and look for Shane.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好去赌场找沙恩了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad to hear that. Here's all the equipment you'll need, including the walkie talkie and camera.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴听到这个消息。这是你需要的所有设备，包括对讲机和照相机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanStar_00049ED9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also, the keys to the front doors. Shane locked the doors behind him when he went in, he always does.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有前门的钥匙。沙恩进去的时候会把门锁上，他总是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanStar_00049ED9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It might be dangerous, so be careful in there. I don't want you to get hurt on my account.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里可能很危险，所以要小心。我不希望你因为我而受伤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanStar_00049ED9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, but you'll probably be fine. Just get in, rescue Shane, and get out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，但你可能会没事的。进去，救沙恩，然后出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanStar_00049ED9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and get some pictures while you're in there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，在里面的时候拍几张照片！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanStar_00049ED9_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck, and good hunting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运，还有狩猎愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanStar_00049ED9_6.ogg

SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 20 1 Set HauntedDialogueQuest.QuestStarted to 1 ForceActiveQuest HauntedMQ01
HauntedGhostHunterRyanRef.AddScriptPackage HauntedRyanWorkPackage HauntedGhostHunterRyanRef.RemoveScriptPackage HauntedRyanIdlePackage HauntedGhostHunterRyanRef.evp
I have some questions about the job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对这份工作有些疑问。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have your answers. Probably, at least. Depends on what you ask, I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有你的答案，至少可能有。我想这取决于你问什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049EF4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How will I talk to you when I'm inside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我进去以后怎么跟你说话？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got walkie talkies for that, I'll give you one when you head inside. Shane and I use them all the time, they're great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有对讲机，你进去的时候我会给你一个。沙恩和我经常用，很好用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049EDC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, they're not perfect. They tend to lose signal when you're in reinforced areas, or when a ghost is being active nearby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，它们并不完美。当你在强化区域，或者附近有鬼魂活跃时，它们往往会丢失信号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049EDC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They work well enough, though. I'll periodically ask for updates while you're inside, and tell you if I detect anything on my equipment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，它们已经足够好用了。你在里面的时候我会定期询问最新情况，如果我在我的设备上发现了什么，我会告诉你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049EDC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why am I going in after Shane? Why not you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我为什么要去找沙恩？为什么不是你去？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well you see, I, uh, need to look after the equipment. Yeah, monitor for ghost activity and such. That sort of thing. That's why I stay outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧你看，我，呃，需要照看设备。对，监视鬼魂活动之类的，诸如此类的事情。这就是我待在外面的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049EDE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I couldn't go inside, no way. After all, only I know how to use the equipment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能进去，不可能。毕竟，只有我知道如何使用这些设备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049EDE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perception Check
Science Check
That's fair enough, I suppose.
It's fine to be scared, I get it. Don't worry about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 害怕没什么，我懂的。别担心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Well, uh, thank you for understanding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？嗯，呃，谢谢你的理解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shane liked to make fun of me for being so scared. In a friendly way, of course, but still, it's nice that you're so understanding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沙恩喜欢取笑我太害怕了，当然是以一种友好的方式。但你这么善解人意还是很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, so you're a coward, got it. Poor fit for a ghost hunter, don't you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，所以你是个懦夫，明白了。作为一个捉鬼人有点可怜，你觉得呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I'm not a coward! Sure, I'm scared as hell of ghosts, but I'm still out here looking for them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我不是懦夫！当然，我很怕鬼魂，但我还是要出去找它们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does that sound like something a coward would do? No!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这听起来像懦夫会做的事吗？不！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just don't freak out on me when I'm in there, alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我进去的时候别吓我，好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't, don't worry. I'm fine as long as I'm not in there, alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会的，别担心。只要我不在里面，我就没事，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, I've done this a lot. I'm used to talking Shane through some very scary moments, trust me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说了，我做过很多次了。相信我，我已经习惯了和沙恩一起度过那些可怕的时刻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Gally's?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说加利酒店的情况吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place used to be the height of luxury before the war. Time... hasn't treated it well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地方战前曾是最奢华的地方。时间...没有好好对待它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049EF6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Though it was never as big as the three casinos still operational today, it was reasonably popular for visitors on the Strip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然它的规模从未像今天仍在运营的三家赌场那样大，但对拉斯维加斯长街上的游客来说，它非常受欢迎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Though, the casino wasn't originally called "Gally's". Long before the war it was called the Mirage, until a fire destroyed the building.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，这家赌场最初并不叫“加利”。在战争之前，它被称为幻景酒店，直到一场大火摧毁了这座建筑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049EF6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was bought by Gally's and renovated, but many before the war reported ghostly occurances linked to the tragic disaster at the Mirage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它被加利集团买下并进行了翻修，但在战前，许多人都报道了与幻景酒店悲惨灾难有关的鬼魂事件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049EF6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now it's in ruins, and from the stories I've heard from locals, the ghosts aren't any calmer now than they were before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在这里已经成了废墟，从我从当地人那里听到的故事来看，鬼魂们并没有比以前平静多少。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049EF6_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to Gally's after the war?
ESP.TRADUIT: 战后加利酒店怎么样了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: According to the locals, it passed hands through various raider gangs over the decades. Few stayed for long, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据当地人说，几十年来，它在不同的掠夺者团伙之间转手。不过，很少有人能长期待在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049EF8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is, until a few years ago, shortly before Mr. House appeared and transformed the Strip into what it is now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 直到数年前，豪斯先生出现并把长街改造成了现在的样子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049EF8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Locals say that the raider gang occupying Gally's suddenly vanished. They never left the building, and no one heard from any members.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当地人说占领加利酒店的掠夺者团伙突然消失了。他们从未离开过大楼，也没有任何成员的消息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049EF8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, no one really had time to investigate since Mr. House rolled in shortly after and took everyone's attention away from Gally's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，没人真正有时间去调查，因为豪斯先生不久就来了，把大家的注意力从加利酒店身上移开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049EF8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, most people forget Gally's exists. Prospectors have gone in, though few return, and the ones that do have frightening tales to tell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，大多数人都忘记了加利酒店的存在。淘金客进去了，但很少有人回来，那些回来的人也有可怕的故事要讲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049EF8_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could there be any ghosts from the Great War in there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 里面会不会有战前的鬼魂？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe, but I doubt it. Most residual hauntings are attached to tragedies strongly associated with a location, like the fire at the Mirage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许吧，但我对此表示怀疑。大多数残存的鬼魂都与某个地点的悲剧紧密相关，就像幻景酒店的大火。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049EFA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Great War was certainly a tragedy, but it wasn't particularly linked to Gally's, since Vegas was spared from the nukes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 世界大战当然是一场悲剧，但它与加利酒店没有特别的联系，因为维加斯并未遭到核武器的威胁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049EFA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm willing to bet that you won't find many ghosts connected to Gally's, mostly those connected to the Mirage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢打赌，你不会找到很多和加利酒店有关的鬼魂，大部分是和幻景有关的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049EFA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything else about the Mirage fire?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还知道什么关于幻景大火的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pre-war articles seem to attribute it to faulty wiring, saying that the fire started in the restaurant and spread to the hotel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根据战前的报道，火灾是从餐厅开始，并蔓延到酒店，似乎是由于线路故障造成的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049EFC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The whole building was scorched, but the North tower was hit the hardest. That's where most of the{pause} deaths happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 整栋大楼都被烧焦了，但北塔受灾最严重。这是大多数死亡发生的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049EFC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A lot of people died there. It's a tragedy, and I can only imagine how their spirits must feel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很多人死在那里。这是一场悲剧，我只能想象他们的灵魂会有什么感受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049EFC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some questions about ghosts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一些关于鬼魂的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where do you think I might find Shane?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得我在哪里能找到沙恩？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, last I heard from him, he was on his way to the penthouse. The signal got interrupted shortly after.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我最后一次听到他的消息，他正在去顶层公寓的路上。信号不久就中断了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : You don't want to say that he might be dead. EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049F00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if he couldn't make it, or if he got stuck somewhere, or if... something worse happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道他是没能到达，还是被困在什么地方了，还是...发生了更糟糕的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : You don't want to say that he might be dead. EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049F00_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Collecting self}But, yeah, he'll likely be on the penthouse floor if he's still... in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Collecting self}但是，是的，他很可能在顶层，如果他还...在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : You don't want to say that he might be dead. EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049F00_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough questions about the job for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于工作的问题到此为止。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you need to know anything else, just let me know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还需要知道什么尽管跟我说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049F02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mentioned I'd get a camera for my investigation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说过会为我的调查准备一台照相机？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, an authentic Ghost Huntin' Camera. If you see a ghostly manifestation while you're in there, be sure to snap a picture!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，一台真正的捉鬼相机。如果你在里面看到鬼魂，一定要拍下来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049F04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll pay you extra for any photos of real ghosts you get. Gotta get that evidence, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你拍到了真正的鬼魂的照片，我会付你额外的钱。你得拿到证据，知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049F04_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't have a lot of film on hand, though, so you should be careful of what you're photographing. You don't need to get fancy about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我们手头的胶卷并不多，所以拍摄时要小心谨慎。不用搞得太花哨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049F04_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anything dangerous in the casino I need to look out for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 赌场里有什么危险的东西需要我注意吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There might be some critters that moved in, but nothing too dangerous, I don't think. Should still bring a gun, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能会有一些可怜的人搬进去，但不会太危险，我想不会。但还是应该带把枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049F06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't bother shooting at ghosts, though. They're already dead, and you might just piss them off if you're not careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，不要费事朝鬼魂开枪。他们已经死了，如果你不小心，可能会把他们惹毛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049F06_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough about Gally's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于加利酒店的问题到此为止。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything else you wanted to know?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_00049F08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all I wanted to know for now.
I always wondered if ghosts were real or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直想知道鬼魂是否真实存在。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kinds of ghosts are there?
HauntedMobsterLineShouldntBeHere
YOU... SHOULDN'T... BE... HERE...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeMobsterGhost\HauntedDia_HauntedMobsterL_0004CCDF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: HauntedMobsterLineEnough
ENOUGH!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeMobsterGhost\HauntedDia_HauntedMobsterL_0004FEA6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I needed to take a break, things are crazy in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要休息一下，那里的事情太疯狂了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Agitated}Really? Look, I get it, more than most. It's terrifying in there, but please, you need to find my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Agitated}真的？听着，我懂，比大多数人都懂。里面很恐怖，但求你了，你得找到我的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, fine. Take your break, but please, be quick about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，没问题。休息一下，但请快点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not going back in there! I quit, you can find your friend yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会再进去了！我不干了，你自己去找你的朋友吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Seriously? God damnit!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, go then, you're fired! I'm not paying you, and I'm taking the equipment back!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，走吧，你被解雇了！我不会给你钱的，我要把设备拿回来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL:
SetStage HauntedMQ01 255
Player.RemoveItem HauntedOutfitGhostHunter 1 Player.RemoveItem HauntedWalkieTalkie 1 Player.RemoveItem HauntedGallysKey 1 Player.RemoveItem HauntedWPNCamera 1 Player.RemoveItem HauntedAmmoCameraFilm 20
HauntedCasLobbyEntDoorRef.Lock 255
set HauntedDialogueQuest.PlayerFired to 1
HauntedShaneHolotapeMessage
If you're listening to this, then either you are Ryan or you're someone Ryan sent in to find me. Either way, you need to listen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你在听，那你要么是赖安要么是赖安派来找我的人。不管怎样，你都要听我说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shane [0201FF12] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeShane\HauntedDia_HauntedShaneHol_00057410_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No use beating around the bush, I suppose. By the time you get this, I'll be dead. Bastard got me good...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想绕弯子也没用了，等你拿到这个，我已经死了。那杂种把我害惨了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shane [0201FF12] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeShane\HauntedDia_HauntedShaneHol_00057410_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't die to a ghost though, Ryan, heh heh... Just by a possessed maniac with a gun. Doesn't...{cough} count.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过不是死于鬼魂，赖安，嘿嘿...只是被一个被附身的疯子用枪打死的。不...{cough}算数。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shane [0201FF12] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeShane\HauntedDia_HauntedShaneHol_00057410_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoever gets this, you need to kill the guy in the penthouse. I locked the door, so he should be stuck in there... for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管谁拿到这个，你必须杀了顶层公寓里的那个人。我把门锁上了，所以他应该被困在里面...暂时如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shane [0201FF12] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeShane\HauntedDia_HauntedShaneHol_00057410_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a... vessel, for something evil. The entity that... infested this whole casino. Even the ghosts are afraid of it, heh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个...容器，用来装邪恶的东西，实体...在整个赌场出没。连鬼魂都怕它，呵呵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shane [0201FF12] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeShane\HauntedDia_HauntedShaneHol_00057410_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Idiot raider must've made some sort of pact... Kill him, and the entity will lose its power. Will set this place... free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 白痴掠夺者一定是达成了某种协议...杀了他，那个实体就会失去力量。会让这个地方...自由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shane [0201FF12] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeShane\HauntedDia_HauntedShaneHol_00057410_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please... do this. For all the spirits left in this place, for yourself, for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托...一定要这样做。为了这个地方所有的灵魂，为了你自己，为了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shane [0201FF12] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeShane\HauntedDia_HauntedShaneHol_00057410_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And Ryan... if you're hearing this... you're not a coward, buddy. You're the bravest person... I've ever met. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有赖安...如果你听到这个...你不是懦夫，伙计。你是最勇敢的人...我见过的。再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shane [0201FF12] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeShane\HauntedDia_HauntedShaneHol_00057410_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
set HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.holotapeListened to 1
SetObjectiveCompleted HauntedMQ01 95 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 100 1
HauntedRadioRyanLobby01
Hey, what the hell just happened in there? Are you alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，刚才到底发生了什么？你还好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The whole casino's power just shut off, and it looks like some security gate closed off the front door. What happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 整个赌场的电力都断了，好像有个安全闸门把前门关了。发生什么事了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Print "Hi it's me Ryan hello"
Print "Okay bye"
I don't know, some alarm went off and the whole place went dark.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，警报响了，整个地方都黑了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn! Well, you can't get out the way you came, the door's blocked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死！你进来的路出不去了，门被堵住了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_0005836D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll have to turn the power back on, it's probably in the basement. See if you can find an entrance to a service route.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得把电源打开，可能在地下室。看看能不能找到一条服务通道的入口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_0005836D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's probably one in the restaurant kitchen, so try heading there. It should be on the right side of the building.
ESP.TRADUIT: 餐厅的厨房里可能就有一个，你去那里试试。它应该在大楼的右侧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_0005836D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, uh, watch your step. It's probably very dark in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有，呃，小心脚下。里面可能很暗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_0005836D_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck, and be careful!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_0005836D_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 30 1 HauntedRadioTalkerLobbyEntranceRef.Disable
HauntedRadioRyanServiceRouteEnt
I think I'm -{losing}- signal, radio's cu-{tting out, y}- ou're on your own for a bi-{t}{static}
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我 -{losing}- 信号，无线电切-{tting out, y}- 你得自己一个人-{t}{static}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00058374_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw someone, or something, following me down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到什么人，或者什么东西，跟在我后面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Shane mentioned something similar when he first went in. That can't be a coincidence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？沙恩第一次进去的时候也说过类似的话，这不可能是巧合。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_0005837B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, regardless, priority is getting to Shane. You'll need a keycard to use the hotel elevator, some pre-war security measure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，不管怎样，当务之急是找到沙恩。你需要一张密钥卡才能使用酒店的电梯，这是战前的安全措施。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_0005837B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It went fine. What do I need to do now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一切都很顺利。我现在需要做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Nothing weird happened? Huh, alright then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？没发生什么奇怪的事？嗯，那好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_0005837D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, regardless, priority is getting to Shane. You'll need a keycard to use the hotel elevator, some pre-war security measure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，不管怎样，当务之急是找到沙恩。你需要一张密钥卡才能使用酒店的电梯，这是战前的安全措施。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_0005837D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where can I find a keycard?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在哪里可以找到密钥卡？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, Shane said he found one in the lounge, but he was only able to find one. There might be more in the VIP section, the Indigo Lounge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，沙恩说他在酒廊找到了一个，但他只找到了一个。贵宾区的靛蓝酒廊可能还有更多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00058382_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately, the door's locked according to Shane. You might be able to find a back entrance through the service route, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，肖恩说门是锁着的。不过，你也许能从服务通道找到一个后门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00058382_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try that. The lounge is on the left side of the building. Lights are on, at least. Should make things better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试试看，酒廊在建筑物的左侧。至少灯是亮着的，应该会让事情变得更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00058382_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep it up, and good luck.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00058382_4.ogg

I don't think I'm safe, there was a very angry ghost in a suit that yelled at me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我不安全，有一个穿着西装的愤怒鬼魂朝我大喊大叫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Sorry, your signal's breaking up, looks like activity in the area is starting up again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？抱歉，你的信号中断了，看起来这个区域的活动又开始了。

I was just yelled at by a ghost in a suit, I don't think I'm supposed to be here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我刚被一个穿西装的鬼吼了，我觉得我不该来这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Sorry, your signal's breaking up, looks like activity in the area is starting up again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？抱歉，你的信号中断了，看起来这个区域的活动又开始了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00058882_1.ogg

HauntedIndigoLoungeRadioEntRef.Disable
