Autosave
HauntedRadioRyanLoungeAlert
I just got chased by a fucking flaming ghost! I barely made it out alive!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我刚被一个该死燃烧的鬼追了！我好不容易才活着出来！

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Chased? That's not right, unless we're dealing with a...
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？追？这不对，除非我们面对的是一个...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00058889_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, shit. You need to find Shane, and fast. He's in horrible danger, and so are you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，该死。你得找到沙恩，越快越好。他很危险，你也一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00058889_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got the keycard, right? Please tell me you got the keycard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有密钥卡，对吧？拜托告诉我你拿到密钥卡了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00058889_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some ghost on fire came after me, but I managed to get out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个着火的鬼追着我，但我设法逃了出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said it came after you? That's odd, usually the only type of ghost that does that is a...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说它在追杀你？这很奇怪，通常只有一种鬼魂会这样做...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_0005888B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, shit. You need to find Shane, and fast. He's in horrible danger, and so are you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，该死。你得找到沙恩，越快越好。他很危险，你也一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_0005888B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got the keycard, right? Please tell me you got the keycard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有密钥卡，对吧？拜托告诉我你拿到密钥卡了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_0005888B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I have the keycard. Should I go take the elevator now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我有密钥卡。我现在要坐电梯吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, and hurry. If the ghost is this aggressive towards you, Shane must be in danger. You need to find him fast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，快点。如果鬼魂对你这么凶，沙恩肯定有危险。你得快点找到他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_0005888D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
HauntedLoungeEscapeRadioRef.Disable
SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 60 1
What do you mean? What kind of ghost am I dealing with here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是什么意思？我要对付的是什么鬼？

ESP.ORIGINAL: All you need to know right now is that it's dangerous, and you need to move quickly. Go take the elevator and find Shane.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在只需要知道这很危险，你要迅速行动。坐电梯去找沙恩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_0005888F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
HauntedLoungeEscapeRadioRef.Disable
SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 60 1
Fuck this shit, I'm getting the hell out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去他妈的，我要离开这鬼地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? No! You need to get Shane! He's in serious danger!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？不！你得去找沙恩！他一定很危险！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00058891_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you leave that building, Shane is as good as dead. Just go and take the elevator and find him, quickly!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你离开那栋楼，沙恩就死定了。快坐电梯去找他，快点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00058891_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
HauntedLoungeEscapeRadioRef.Disable
SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 60 1
HauntedRadioRyanLobbyElevAlert
Oh, also, I'll probably lose your signal while you're in the elevator. Just letting you know beforehand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，还有，你在电梯里的时候我可能会失去你的信号。只是事先让你知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00058D8F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think the elevator fell, or something. I don't know where I am, one of the hotel floors I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想是电梯掉下来了，还是怎么的。我不知道我在哪里，估计是酒店的某一层吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit. Okay, if you're not hurt too bad, just keep moving. There are stairs connecting the floors, you can use them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的。好吧，如果你伤得不重，就继续走。有楼梯连接楼层，你可以使用它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00058D95_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to get out of the building and get help. Get back to the casino floor and get out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须离开大楼，寻求帮助。回到赌场楼层，然后离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00058D95_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Though... you might not be able to. Shane said the stairs were blocked... Shit. Okay, new plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管...你可能无法。沙恩说楼梯被堵住了...妈的。好吧，新计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00058D95_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go to the stairs, and go up. Try to find Shane, he has meds on him, he can help. Good luck, and stay safe, please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走楼梯，上楼去。去找沙恩，他身上有药物，他能帮上忙。祝你好运，请注意安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00058D95_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
HauntedHotel01RyanRadioRef.Disable
SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 70 1
The elevator fucking fell, it was that fucking ghost! I almost died! Now I'm stuck in this hotel!
ESP.TRADUIT: 电梯掉下来了，是那个该死的鬼！我差点就死了！现在我被困在这家酒店里了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit. Okay, if you're not hurt too bad, just keep moving. There are stairs connecting the floors, you can use them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的。好吧，如果你伤得不重，就继续走。有楼梯连接楼层，你可以使用它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00058D97_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to get out of the building and get help. Get back to the casino floor and get out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须离开大楼，寻求帮助。回到赌场楼层，然后离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00058D97_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Though... you might not be able to. Shane said the stairs were blocked... Shit. Okay, new plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管...你可能无法。沙恩说楼梯被堵住了...妈的。好吧，新计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00058D97_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go to the stairs, and go up. Try to find Shane, he has meds on him, he can help. Good luck, and stay safe, please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走楼梯，上楼去。去找沙恩，他身上有药物，他能帮上忙。祝你好运，请注意安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00058D97_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
HauntedHotel01RyanRadioRef.Disable
SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 70 1
HauntedGhostRun
Run!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeGhostGeneric\HauntedDia_HauntedGhostRun_0005B67A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: HauntedMobsterPentIntro
You... You have made it too far. Those pitiful spirits have aided you, haven't they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...你做得太过分了。那些可怜的灵魂帮助了你，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ghost [0205B99B] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeMobsterGhost\HauntedDia_HauntedMobsterP_0005B99A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I must admit, you would've made a much finer vessel than the idiot. With you, I could've escaped this damned place by now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得承认，你做容器肯定比那个白痴好得多。有了你，我现在就能逃离这个鬼地方了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ghost [0205B99B] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeMobsterGhost\HauntedDia_HauntedMobsterP_0005B99A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
HauntedPenthouseHallucMobsterRef.RemoveScriptPackage HauntedPenthouseMobsterTalkPackage
set HauntedDialogueQuest.mobsterTalkDone to 1
Escape this place? You want to leave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 逃离这个地方？你想离开？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes! I've been trapped in this hellish purgatory for centuries! I will escape, and I will return to the city I once conquered!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的！我被困在这可憎的炼狱里好几个世纪了！我要逃走，我要回到我曾经征服过的城市！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ghost [0205B99B] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeMobsterGhost\HauntedDia_HauntedMobsterP_0005B99D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This vessel, this... weakling. Didn't have the strength to escape. Stuck here all the same, even after the... sacrifices.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个容器，这个...虚弱的人，没有逃脱的力量。一直被困在这里，即使在...献祭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ghost [0205B99B] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeMobsterGhost\HauntedDia_HauntedMobsterP_0005B99D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you trying to kill me?
I take all who enter my casino, my beautiful Mirage. Their... deaths... feed the casino. Its power, its hunger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我带走所有进入我赌场的人，我美丽的幻景。他们...死亡...为赌场提供食物。它的力量，它的渴望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ghost [0205B99B] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeMobsterGhost\HauntedDia_HauntedMobsterP_0005B99F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If only I knew its potential before... I could've ruled this city in my life with the power this place could grant me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是我早知道它的潜力就好了...我本可以用这个地方赋予我的力量来统治这座城市。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ghost [0205B99B] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeMobsterGhost\HauntedDia_HauntedMobsterP_0005B99F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough. Why are you talking to me now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了。你为什么现在跟我说话？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I simply wanted to meet you, face to face, before you die. Perhaps you'll inhabit this place like I have, in which case...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是想在你死之前，见到你，面对面。也许你会像我一样居住在这里，那样的话...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ghost [0205B99B] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeMobsterGhost\HauntedDia_HauntedMobsterP_0005B9A1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will have such sights to show you. Your eternity will be spent in torment, with all the souls I have within my grasp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我将向你展示这些景象。你的永生将在折磨中度过，与我所掌握的所有灵魂同在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ghost [0205B99B] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeMobsterGhost\HauntedDia_HauntedMobsterP_0005B9A1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For now, it's time for you to face my vessel. Come.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，你该面对我的容器了。来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ghost [0205B99B] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeMobsterGhost\HauntedDia_HauntedMobsterP_0005B9A1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
HauntedPenthouseHallucMobsterRef.AddScriptPackage HauntedPenthouseMobsterWalkToRoomPackage HauntedPenthouseHallucMobsterRef.evp
SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 101 1
So, this is your place then? The Mirage?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，这就是你的地盘？幻景？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I built the Mirage from the ground up, carved out my place in this city. It was to be my... masterpiece.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从零开始建造了幻景，在这个城市开辟了我的位置。这是我的...杰作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ghost [0205B99B] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeMobsterGhost\HauntedDia_HauntedMobsterP_0005D79D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the Mirage died, I died with it, as the fire scorched the halls and the ceilings collapsed...
ESP.TRADUIT: 幻景死的时候，我也跟着死了，大火烧焦了大厅，天花板坍塌了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ghost [0205B99B] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeMobsterGhost\HauntedDia_HauntedMobsterP_0005D79D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This new casino... the one built from the skeleton of my Mirage... has allowed me to remain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个新赌场...用我的幻景骨架建造的那个...让我留下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ghost [0205B99B] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeMobsterGhost\HauntedDia_HauntedMobsterP_0005D79D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: HauntedMobsterLineToWarren
Now, vessel... prove your worth. Kill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，容器...证明你的价值。杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ghost [0205B99B] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeMobsterGhost\HauntedDia_HauntedMobsterL_0005DCB0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
;HauntedPenthouseHallucWarrenRef.StopIdle VanGraffCustomerCower ;HauntedPenthouseHallucWarrenRef.SayTo HauntedPenthouseHallucMobsterRef HauntedWarrenYell
; Adding this to maybe stop him from doing the weird jitter ;HauntedPenthouseHallucMobsterRef.RemoveScriptPackage HauntedPenthouseWarrenCowerPackage ;HauntedPenthouseHallucMobsterRef.evp
; Changed this to remove the yell, since it didnt work set HauntedHotelPenthouseRoomTriggerRef.startFight to 1
HauntedWarrenYell
Aaaaaghhhhh!!!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Warren [02059F53] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: set HauntedHotelPenthouseRoomTriggerRef.startFight to 1
Something was following me down there, this shit is fucked!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有东西在下面跟着我，这下惨了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, you're doing great. I know it can be scary as hell sometimes, but we have to manage, alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你做得很好。我知道有时候会很可怕，但我们得控制住，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00062820_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, regardless, priority is getting to Shane. You'll need a keycard to use the hotel elevator, some pre-war security measure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，不管怎样，当务之急是找到沙恩。你需要一张密钥卡才能使用酒店的电梯，这是战前的安全措施。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00062820_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I made it to the Indigo Lounge, but I don't think I'm alone here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去了靛蓝酒廊，但我想这里不止我一个人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Sorry, your signal's breaking up, looks like activity in the area is starting up again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？抱歉，你的信号中断了，看起来这个区域的活动又开始了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00062822_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get that keycard, and be caref-{ul!}{static}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00062822_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
HauntedIndigoLoungeRadioEntRef.Disable
SetObjectiveDisplayed HauntedMQ01 55 1
Autosave
I was just chased out of the lounge by some ghost in a suit, what the hell is happening?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我刚被一个穿西装的鬼赶出了酒廊，这到底是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chased by a ghost in a suit? Wait, you don't mean... oh... oh, no...
ESP.TRADUIT: 被一个穿西装的鬼魂追？等等，你不会是说...噢...噢，不...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00062824_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, shit. You need to find Shane, and fast. He's in horrible danger, and so are you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，该死。你得找到沙恩，越快越好。他很危险，你也一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00062824_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got the keycard, right? Please tell me you got the keycard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有密钥卡，对吧？拜托告诉我你拿到密钥卡了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [02058368] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRadioRya_00062824_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, but he was gone when I reached him. He left this holotape behind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我找到他的时候他已经死了。他留下了这个全息磁带。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, god... Shane, no...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_0006411C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I would be lying if I said I didn't expect this. It was the only real way this could end, but I was still holding out hope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...如果我说我没想到会这样，那一定是在说谎。这是唯一能结束这一切的方法，但我仍然抱着希望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_0006411C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Deep breath}What about you? How are you doing?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_0006411C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been worse, but that was certainly an ordeal. Just glad to get out alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我经历过更糟的，但那确实是一种折磨。很高兴能活着出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I can imagine. I'm terribly sorry, I had no idea it would be that dangerous. I didn't think we would find something like that in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我能想象。我非常抱歉，我不知道会这么危险。我没想到我们会在里面找到这样的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064124_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for this, seriously. Even if Shane's... gone, at least now I know. And that's thanks to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的，谢谢你。即使沙恩...不在了，至少现在我知道了。这都要感谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064124_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I guess that's it. Oh, wait, did you manage to get any photos while you were in there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我想就是这样了。等等，你在里面的时候拍到了什么照片吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064124_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was able to get some photos, yeah. Here's what I've got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我拍到了一些照片。给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it's a good thing that this wasn't a total loss. You've got some good photos here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，还好这不是一场彻底的失败。你这儿有一些不错的照片。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064126_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shane would've appreciated this. He is... was... always gunning to get the best evidence possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沙恩会很感激的。他...是...总是千方百计想要得到最好的证据。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064126_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your extra payment. You earned it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的额外报酬，这是你应得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064126_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... what happened in there?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064126_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem HauntedWPNCamera 1 Player.RemoveItem HauntedAmmoCameraFilm 25

int capsAmount
set capsAmount to (HauntedCasinoVariableQuest.photosTotal * 150)
Player.AddItem Caps001 capsAmount
I can't say I blame you, honestly. I wouldn't have been able to get any photos if I were in your shoes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老实说，我不能怪你。如果我处在你的位置，我肯定拍不到任何照片。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064127_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shane would've loved to get the photos, though...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过沙恩肯定很想拿到照片...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064127_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... what happened in there?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064127_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem HauntedWPNCamera 1 Player.RemoveItem HauntedAmmoCameraFilm 25
I wasn't able to get any photos.
I barely made it out of there alive. You owe me, a lot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我差点没能活着出来。你欠我很多。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know, I know. I'm sorry, I didn't think that it'd be anything that dangerous. I should've known better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道，我知道。对不起，我没想到会有那么危险。我早该知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064129_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for this, seriously. Even if Shane's... gone, at least now I know. And that's thanks to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的，谢谢你。即使沙恩...不在了，至少现在我知道了。这都要感谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064129_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I guess that's it. Oh, wait, did you manage to get any photos while you were in there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我想就是这样了。等等，你在里面的时候拍到了什么照片吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064129_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you care more about the photos than your friend?
ESP.TRADUIT: 比起朋友，你更在乎照片？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? No! I just want this endevour to be worth something, for Shane's... death to be worth something!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？不！我只是想让这一切有所值，为了沙恩的...死有价值！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_0006412B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He would've wanted these photos. He'd be pissed at me if he found out that I left this place without any photos.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他肯定想要这些照片。如果他发现我没带任何照片就离开了这里，他会生我的气的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_0006412B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, do you have anything for me or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底有没有东西要给我？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_0006412B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: HauntedMobsterLineNooooo
No.... NO!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeMobsterGhost\HauntedDia_HauntedMobsterL_0006412D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shane's dead, I found his body in the penthouse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沙恩死了，我在顶层发现了他的尸体。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, god... Shane, no...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064130_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I would be lying if I said I didn't expect this. It was the only real way this could end, but I was still holding out hope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...如果我说我没想到会这样，那一定是在说谎。这是唯一能结束这一切的方法，但我仍然抱着希望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064130_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Deep breath}What about you? How are you doing?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064130_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I followed Shane's instructions and managed to banish the ghost, I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我按照沙恩的指示把鬼魂驱逐了，我觉得。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow... that's... I can't believe you did it. We've never encountered anything like that spirit, we were only going off of theories.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇...这...我真不敢相信你做到了。我们从未遇到过这样的鬼魂，我们只是根据推测行事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064133_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The books said they existed, but we had never met one ourselves. Of course Shane would know it when he saw it...
ESP.TRADUIT: 书上说它们存在，但我们自己从没见过。当然沙恩看到它时，他会知道的...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064133_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you did a fantastic job. You've more than earned the title of Ghost Hunter, so you can keep the jacket.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，你干得非常出色。你已经赢得了捉鬼人的称号，所以你可以留着这件夹克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064133_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and the payment for the job, as promised.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，还有工作的报酬，我答应过的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064133_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Player.AddItem Caps001 2000
Player.RemoveItem HauntedWalkieTalkie 1
I killed some raider a ghost was possessing, and I think that banished it according to Shane.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了一个被鬼魂附身的掠夺者，沙恩说我把它驱逐了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow... that's... I can't believe you did it. We've never encountered anything like that spirit, we were only going off of theories.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇...这...我真不敢相信你做到了。我们从未遇到过这样的鬼魂，我们只是根据推测行事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064134_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The books said they existed, but we had never met one ourselves. Of course Shane would know it when he saw it...
ESP.TRADUIT: 书上说它们存在，但我们自己从没见过。当然沙恩看到它时，他会知道的...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064134_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you did a fantastic job. You've more than earned the title of Ghost Hunter, so you can keep the jacket.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，你干得非常出色。你已经赢得了捉鬼人的称号，所以你可以留着这件夹克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064134_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and the payment for the job, as promised.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，还有工作的报酬，我答应过的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064134_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Player.AddItem Caps001 2000
Player.RemoveItem HauntedWalkieTalkie 1
What kind of ghosts can I expect to find in there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能在里面找到什么样的鬼魂？

ESP.ORIGINAL: For the most part, you probably won't be able to see them. Full manifestations of residual spirits are rare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数情况下，你可能看不到它们。残存灵魂的完整表现是十分罕见的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_0006462D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most residual spirits are peaceful, they can just be... startling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数残存的灵魂都是和平的，他们只是...令人吃惊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_0006462D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some ghosts, however, can be... violent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，有些鬼魂可以...很暴力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_0006462D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, there's a very low chance you'll see one like that in there. We haven't encountered one in all of our years of ghost hunting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，你在那里看到这样的东西的可能性很小。我们这么多年捉鬼都没碰到过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanJobQ_0006462D_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's next for you?
Well, I'm not sure. I'll need to pack up all of my equipment, which'll take a while, but after that...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我不确定。我需要把我所有的设备打包，这需要一段时间，但在那之后...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_0006462F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without Shane, I'm not sure if I have the courage to continue ghost hunting. Though, it would be what he wanted...
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有了沙恩，我不知道我是否还有勇气继续捉鬼。不过，这可能是他想要的...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_0006462F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure. What do you think?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_0006462F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set HauntedDialogueQuest.QuestComplete to 1
You should keep ghost hunting. It's what Shane would've wanted, I'm sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该继续捉鬼。我相信这是沙恩想要的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right. We started this because we loved doing it, I'm sure Shane wouldn't stand watching me settle down somewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对。我们这样做是因为我们喜欢这样做，我相信沙恩无法忍受看着我在某个地方安定下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064631_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, I've still got a long list of places I want to visit. I'll try and build up my courage too, Shane would've liked that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此外，我还有一长串想去的地方。我也会努力鼓起勇气的，沙恩会喜欢的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064631_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for your help, really. Maybe we'll meet again, who knows, but for now, goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的帮助，真的。也许我们还会再见面，谁知道呢，但现在，再见了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064631_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage HauntedMQ01 150 set HauntedDialogueQuest.RyanEnding to 2
You clearly aren't meant for ghost hunting, you should settle down somewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你显然不适合捉鬼，你应该找个地方安顿下来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you're probably right. Even I did keep it up, I wouldn't ever have the courage to actually investigate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你可能是对的。即使我坚持下去，我也没有勇气真正去调查。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064633_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I'll go find some job back at the Hub, somewhere I can take it easy. Write a book, maybe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我该回中枢市找份工作，找个能让我放松的地方。也许写本书吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064633_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for your help, really. Maybe we'll meet again, who knows, but for now, goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的帮助，真的。也许我们还会再见面，谁知道呢，但现在，再见了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064633_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage HauntedMQ01 150 set HauntedDialogueQuest.RyanEnding to 3
I can't tell you what to do, that's up to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能告诉你该怎么做，这是你自己的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, that's fair. I'll have to think it over before I make any decision. Should head back to the Hub anyways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，这很公平。我得仔细考虑一下再做决定。反正我也该回中枢市了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064635_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for your help, really. Maybe we'll meet again, who knows, but for now, goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的帮助，真的。也许我们还会再见面，谁知道呢，但现在，再见了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [0201D71E] (mod) Quest : ([02021205]HauntedDialogueQuest) 02021205 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Haunted Casino.esm\HauntedVoiceTypeRyan\HauntedDia_HauntedRyanQues_00064635_2.ogg

HauntedGhostThankYou
Thank you...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Travel to the Strip Ruins and speak to the Ghost Hunter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往长街废墟并与捉鬼人交谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enter the Gally's Hotel & Casino.
Turn the casino's power back on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把赌场的电源重新打开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lift the security lockdown.
Return to the lobby.
Find the elevator keycard in the Indigo Lounge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在靛蓝酒廊找到电梯密钥卡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Escape the Indigo Lounge.
Find the Indigo Lounge door key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到靛蓝酒廊的门钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take the elevator to the penthouse.
Traverse through the hotel floors to reach the penthouse floor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 穿过酒店楼层到达顶层。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take the elevator to the penthouse.
Find Shane.
Listen to Shane's holotape message.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听听沙恩的全息磁带留言。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enter the penthouse.
Take the elevator down to the casino floor.
Leave Gally's Hotel & Casino.
Speak with Ryan.
I should find my hotel room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该找到我的酒店房间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should rest in my hotel room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该在我的酒店房间休息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to escape.
Get the key for the basement power room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去拿地下室电力室的钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Escape the hotel floor.
Follow the ghost.
Kill Warren.
Go through the Service Route to access the Indigo Lounge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通过服务通道进入靛蓝酒廊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Call the elevator in the casino lobby.
Insert the VIP Keycard into the elevator.
Kill the reanimated corpses.
Visit To Vegas
I should find the hotel floor I'm staying at.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该找到我住的酒店楼层。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should speak to the hotel staff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该和酒店工作人员谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should find my room.
I should rest in my hotel room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该在我的酒店房间休息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to go.
I need to leave.
I need to escape.
Force
Force
You should listen to the holotape first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该先听听全息磁带。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't sleep right now.
The panel is unresponsive without a keycard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有密钥卡面板就没有反应。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The elevator is currently moving.
The camera isn't functioning currently.
The scanner takes a keycard for the elevator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 扫描仪需要一张电梯密钥卡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The camera seems to be working properly again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 照相机似乎又能正常工作了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your hand radio no longer seems functional.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的手提无线电似乎不能用了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should get the elevator keycard first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该先拿到电梯密钥卡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The elevator is on its way.
This elevator won't work without power.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这部电梯没有电就无法运行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The generators need to be started in order to restore power.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了恢复电力，需要启动发电机。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is not my room.
You are suffocating in the smoke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在烟雾中快要窒息了。
